Public Remarks: A beautifully appointed 3539 sq.ft. home checks all the boxes, with location & design.   This 4BR/2.5BA/3CG, & two loft spaces, is not to be missed. The main level offers a large kitchen & family room, along with a formal living room, dining room.  4thBR is currently being used as an office. The master and two secondary bedrooms are split on the second floor. Open interior spaces are strategically located to make this home ideal for entertaining, combined with private courtyard, patios and a spectacular play pool.  AVIANO community amenities include a private clubhouse, fitness center, heated pools & spas, basketball, tennis and a rock climbing wall. Walking distance to schools, parks, playgrounds, dining & shopping.

Providing a very spacious front and back yard on nearly an acre of land. The bright and charming interior of the main home features 3 bed, 3 bath, living/dining area, several windows that bring-in so much natural light, and neutral paint throughout the entire house. You will love this gourmet kitchen complete with sparkling stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, granite counter-tops, dark cabinetry with crown molding and with breakfast bar. Inside the master bedroom you will find a barn door custom closet and an impeccable full bath. Then there is also an additional room with separate entry that has it's own bathroom and kitchenette for guest

Public Remarks: Beautiful remodeled home with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in the quiet community of Del Monte Plaza. Kitchen has been beautifully done with granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances including built-in microwave, stove, and dishwasher. Other updates include newly remodeled bathrooms and fresh paint inside and out. This home has a spacious backyard perfect for families and entertaining. This home is minutes from Hermoso Skatepark, and Esteban Park which offers lighted baseball field, lighted basketball courts, playground, ramada and picnic area, restrooms, soccer field and much more. This community is close to restaurants, shopping and entertainment and has easy travel access to I10. This home is a must see!

Public Remarks: LOCATION!  Prepare to be impressed by this spectacular 4 bedrooms, 2.5 baths, corner lot home.  A truly move-in ready, has formal living room and dining. Newly painted inside including garage.   All bedrooms upstairs.  Huge loft and generously sized bedrooms with ample closets and ceilings fans.  Other bedroom has mirrored sliding door.  Only Tile and Laminate wood flooring.  No carpets on this house. Upgraded kitchen has cherry cabinets, designer backsplash. Family room opens to a full size  covered patio with pavers, sparkling  pool with full fence. Two Air conditioning units secured  with steel enclosure. Close to school, and  Banner Estrella Hospital. Minutes to Tanger Shopping,  Westgate Entertainment and Restaurant. Easy access to 101 and I-10 freeways.   A MUST SEE!!!

Public Remarks: Rare opportunity to own this completely remodeled home with a Casita on a large lot with a pool! This 5 bedroom, 4 bathroom home is spacious with a bright theme and open concept floor plan. Complete Remodel in 2019 included new wood tile floors, new stainless steel appliances, new ceiling fans, new windows, new plumbing, new electrical, updated bathrooms, new white kitchen cabinets, tile backsplash, granite countertops and stand alone 2 car garage. The Casita has a full bathroom, entrance at the front and back side and separate living room from bedroom. The main home has 3 bedrooms on one side of the home and the master suite is on the opposite side.

All bedrooms are upstairs together. Great yard also has a covered patio ready for all to enjoy.

Public Remarks: This home has everything you're looking for - stunning mountain views, gated community, large lot and central location! As you approach the home you will be in awe of the South Mountain views. The greenbelt across the street provides an unimpeded view. Entering the home, you'll love the beautiful wood-look high-end laminate flooring. The kitchen features a unique breakfast bar and a walk-in pantry. Main bedroom and bathroom are spacious and feature a separate garden jetted tub and snail shower. The backyard is a desert oasis with a walking path that takes you around the yard to enjoy all the unique desert plants. Paver patio provides plenty of space to entertain or relax and enjoy the tranquil yard. Easy access to South Mountain and its 51 miles of trails, and numerous freeways.

Public Remarks: Charming 3 bed, 2 bath property in Arroyo Rojo is now on the market! Enter to discover an inviting living/dining area featuring neutral palette, tile floors, media niche, vaulted ceilings, & a cozy fireplace. Pass the archway to find yourself in the oversized family room with flagstone flooring & French doors leading to the back patio. The immaculate kitchen boasts plenty of wood cabinets, granite counters, a pantry, a center island, & a peninsula with a breakfast bar. Double doors open to the primary bedroom showcasing soft carpet, a private bathroom, & a walk-in closet. Host fun gatherings in the wonderful backyard with covered patio, sparkling pool w/stone waterfall, & lots of space for relaxing or sunbathing! A deal like this won't last! Call today before it's gone!

Public Remarks: Location, location, location! This brand new 4,033 sq ft. Arcadia Lite home designed by Ugalde Architectural designs is within walking distance to La Grande Orange, Postinos and Kachina Park. Original 1954 home was torn down in 2016 and completely remodeled in 2019. The spacious 3 bedroom, 3 bath also has an office and additional huge family/bonus room. This home has great curb appeal with a welcoming entry, front porch with railing, sail cloths, and firepit. The kitchen has an impressive 11.5 foot kitchen island with an accent wall of shiplap. The custom hood perfectly compliments the 4 foot wide kitchen aid 6 burner gas stove & griddle. The living room has a shiplap fireplace and great natural light from the side courtyard.

Public Remarks: As seen on HGTV! This Modern Fortified Masterpiece 4-bedroom, 4.5-bath, 4,228-sq.ft. home goes beyond one-of-a-kind. Those experiencing it in the noumenal state will feel transformed by the space. The 1.22-acre estate sits at the end of a private drive. Designated horse property with no HOA, just moments from the South Mountain Preserve with horse, hiking,  and bike trails, minutes from valley freeways. Over $300k in renovations by the award-winning architects at The Ranch Mine add incredible security and aesthetic features to this home, neither being sacrificed for the other. 18' ceilings, captivating mountain views, unparalleled natural light. Features include: Level 8 ballistic steel, bulletproof acrylics, commercial roll-down gates, and a 1200-sq.ft. panic area that can be locked down.

Public Remarks: Your dream equestrian estate is here! Spoil your horses in this custom built 450k tongue-and-groove 3,000 sq.ft. BARN with 8 enclosed stalls, complete with full tack room, 2 feed rooms, washroom, internet, cameras, ceiling fans, and auto-waterers. Each stall has a rotating feed door for easy access and doors leading out to covered paddocks.  Enjoy riding on almost 2 acres featuring 2 seeded flood-irrigation pastures, a round pen, 60 x 120 arena and citrus orchard all pipe-fenced in. After riding, take a dip in your sparkling blue 9ft diving POOL, dine under the gazebo, cozy up with friends by the outdoor fireplace, or bring the fun inside to the fully enclosed Arizona room.  Take a walk through the white picket fence and enter your charming remodeled tri-level home.

Public Remarks: Amazing home on a spacious lot in the desired Tramonto community. The main level features an office/potential 5th bedroom with a walk-in closet next to a full bathroom, a half-bath, laundry room and a large dining area that flows into the kitchen/living space. The sliding doors lead to a covered patio area with a built-in grill and plenty of private yard space. The upper level features 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms plus an open loft area with a built in desk. Master includes a walk-in closet and ensuite stand alone tub and shower. Entire flooring updated throughout home along with a kitchen update featuring new countertops and a gas range stovetop. Tankless water heater added. Home comes equipped with 3-car garage spaces. Outside of home repainted. You don't want to miss this opportunity!!

Public Remarks: Spacious 5-bedroom plus 2 additional rooms that could be used as Dens, Bedrooms, Playrooms, Offices, Storage, etc.  New Luxury plank flooring & newer carpet throughout. Kitchen features all stainless-steel appliances with double-oven stove, and walk-in pantry.   Great Room has New modern fans w/remotes. 1-bedroom, bonus rooms and  bath downstairs.   Under Stairs is large storage as well. Sliding glass door exits to large yard complete with RV gate & concrete parking pad.    Upstairs features a large loft with mountain views, laundry room (which accommodates dual WDs), storage cabinets, 2 full baths & 4-bedrooms (including Master, which has remodeled bathroom w/extra-large tub and 2-shower heads). Large walk-in closet in master.

Multiple offers anticipated.

Downtown, shopping & dinning in any direction within minutes to freeways anywhere around the valley. Don't miss this AZ lifestyle gem!

Public Remarks: Look no more! NO HOA! Come and see this charming 4 bed, 2 bath home in Central Phoenix! Nestled on a large corner lot offering lush green landscape, RV gate, and plenty of parking space. Enter to discover formal living & dining rooms, a gas fireplace, laminate floors w/tile in wet areas, and neutral paint throughout. The kitchen boasts slate appliances, solid-surface counters, recessed lighting, white shaker cabinets, and an island w/breakfast bar. Spacious family room can be anything you want it to be! Primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and an ensuite with a garden tub, separate shower, & a vessel sink. Out the back, you have a covered patio to relax and enough room for entertaining. Near Grand Canyon University, shopping, dining, light rail, and easy access to I-17!

Public Remarks: Exceptional value on this custom home with modern farmhouse aesthetic. .31 acre lot offers inimitable indoor/outdoor living spaces. Entertain at kitchen ramada with BBQ, ice chests, sink, TV, commercial misters & bar seating. Swim year-around in heated quartz-finish pool w/ water features & limestone decking. Eco-friendly turf, fire pit & view deck. Smart Google Home system & EV charger. RV gate & parking for 10 cars.

Public Remarks: Remodeled home in an extremely convenient Phoenix location, with NO HOA. With 4 beds, 2 baths, this home has plenty of space to offer! Open and bright kitchen, living and dining. Interior upgrades include beautiful neutral LVP flooring, wide base trim, updated kitchen appliances, and newer bathroom surround tile.  Backyard is ready for you to make it your private oasis, complete with pool and spa, and built in BBQ! Backyard shed makes a great storage space, or work area.  Large solar system, to be paid off by seller at closing! More photos coming soon. Pending buyer preferences, Seller plans to spread rock in front landscape. No showings while tenant is in place.

Public Remarks: Beautiful single level home with breathtaking mountain view.    Right off the bat, as you walk into this beautiful one story house, you'll be standing in a large foyer that opens up into an even larger living room. The rest of the house doesn't disappoint either, with 4 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and plenty of open space. The kitchen has beautiful granite counters and connects to the family room which includes a fireplace. Walking into the backyard, you'll instantly feel a sense of tranquility while being greeted by a spectacular view of the sky and mountains. Not to mention the sight of the backyard as well, which is huge and decked out with a basketball court, swing, benches, waterfall pond, and lots of gorgeous greenery.
Directions: West on Chandler Blvd, Turn right onto 30th Avenue(through Summit second gate), turn left on Ashurst Drive

Public Remarks: Located in the Coronado Neighborhood on 14th st, South of Thomas! This Unique Spanish Modern home was actually built in 1936! Updated over the years, the list of upgrades includes newer ac unit, new electrical panel and solar panels, full drip system irrigation in the backyard with multiple zones, expertly laid out landscaping front and back for minimal upkeep. Electric rear gate and carport access. Newer modern kitchen with tons of cabinet space and newer appliances , recessed lighting, separate interior laundry room, porcelain tile and wood look vinyl throughout!

Public Remarks: New home to be constructed! Anticipated build time is 10 months. Hidden amidst the scenic foothills of Lookout Mountain Preserve, and surrounded by hiking trails and world-class desert golf, Paradigm is an intimate, gated 12-lot community coming soon to North Phoenix from Camelot Homes. This two-story home features the Plus Model/Plan 2-A and is designed with a bonus room on the second floor to enjoy scenic views to the South, as well as a 3 car tandem garage. The open concept floorplan is artfully crafted to capture the spectacular desert surroundings and a seamless connection to striking outdoor living. **Landscape design to be buyer's choice but is not included by the builder. All photo/renderings are conceptual for representation purposes and subject to change.**

Public Remarks: Wonderful Large Custom home on Central Avenue with 3 bedrooms, 3 baths. Beautiful oak hardwood floors, plantation shutters, updated appliances, French doors and custom built-in bookshelves in the family room & 2nd bedroom/office. The vaulted ceilings and exposed beams give this home an elegant and open feel. Perfect home for indoor and outdoor entertaining. 2 fireplaces. Newly painted inside & outside & newer exterior gates to rear yard. 2 covered patios, outdoor kitchen with built-in BBQ & beverage fridge. Grassy yard for kids or dogs to run & play, and above ground spa to relax at the end of the day! Foam Roof recovered in  2016. Located in the desirable North Central Corridor along the bridal/walking path, top-rated Madison school district and amazing restaurants & shops nearby.

Public Remarks: Rare buying opportunity! MODERN UPGRADED HOME!! Solar Panel set up (Leasing) this system can offset most of your energy usage and Newer A/C. Interior offers a welcoming living/dining room with ceramic floor tile, no carpets with a Bright open floor plan. Kitchen has Granite countertops, designer palette, SS appliances, Wine refrigerator, Gas oven, big pantry, and plenty of counter space for all your cooking needs. Recently Updated Bathrooms, Double door Master Suite with Vaulted Ceilings and Nice sized walk-in closet, Secondary bedroom with walk-in closet, Upgraded staircase, huge back yard with covered patio, RV Gate & Parking for all the toys. *Private office upstairs*. You will appreciate the care the sellers have taken with maintaining this home as you walk through the front door.

Public Remarks: Experience this Stately Hillside contemporary estate on Iconic Camelback Mountain by Living Stone Builders. The main level features a spectacular owner's suite with retractable glass slider, private terrace, stunning bathroom and spacious walk-in closet! The three additional en-suite bedrooms offer a split floorplan including a game room/gym with bar. The chef's kitchen features Wolf/Sub Zero appliances, concrete countertops and custom cabinetry. This property offers the best of Arizona's Indoor/Outdoor living with a large low maintenance yard, multiple retractable glass sliding walls that open to an oversized outdoor patio, heated pool & spa and firepit. The lower level offers a private guest suite, multiple storage areas and a 5 car garage with gated motor court! Completion in 3-4 months

Public Remarks: Remodeled 4bd/4 bath plus den and office or bed 5 and 6. First floor master and office/bed 5, fully remodeled kitchen, and redesigned interior is just the beginning. Stunning Chef's kitchen showcases a plethora of wood cabinets, SS appliances, travertine tile backsplash, wine rack, an island w/breakfast bar, a pantry, & backyard access.  The interior boasts high ceilings, a bright living/dining area, & wood-like tile flooring throughout downstairs. Engineered wood floor upstairs. The fantastic primary bedroom comes w/bay windows, recessed lightings, sitting area, a private ensuite w/dual sinks, & a separate tub. Perfectly-sized secondary bedrooms and loft/bed 6 can be found upstairs. Easy access to trails to Sonoran Desert Preserve. Great Fireside Norterra amenities for your use.

Public Remarks: Check out this charming 4 bed, 2 bath home in the wonderful city of Phoenix! Providing a 1 car garage, low-care front yard, and a circular driveway. Discover a spacious & welcoming living room, designer paint, tile floors in main areas, and carpet in bedrooms. The kitchen includes an SS Elec range oven, granite counters, ample cabinets, crown molding, and track lighting. Formal dining room with built-in shelves & a sliding door to the back can also be used as a family room or office. Main bedroom has a walk-in closet and private bathroom for added comfort. Large backyard provides a storage shed, cozy patio, and so much potential for customizing it any way you can imagine. With room for a pool, you can make it a complete paradise! Close to light rail, shopping, & more. Book a showing today!

Public Remarks: A beautiful 4 bed, 2.5 bath home is now back on the market! Featuring a 2 car garage, and a low-maintenance front yard. Discover a charming interior featuring bright neutral paint, and gorgeous Travertine flooring t/out the main areas, plantation shutters, and vaulted ceilings adding to the spacious and airy feel. Enjoy entertaining in the formal living/dining area or in the fireplace family room complete with a media wall. The kitchen features built-in appliances, ample wood cabinets, black granite counters, and a center island meal prep. The upstairs main bedroom boasts spacious mirrored closet, and spotless en suite w/dual sinks, & Travertine shower. Sunken loft is great for a den or media room. Out back is a covered/extended patio, & citrus tree just great for relaxing. A Must See!

Public Remarks: Rare, Historically designated home in the heart of downtown Phoenix! This Spanish Colonial jewel has been immaculately maintained preserving its original historic charm to the highest level! This elegant home displays exceptional attention to detail, with well-preserved, original hardwood flooring and basketweave flooring in the bathroom & basement. Enter into a Grand living room with high coved ceilings and a gorgeous gas-burning fireplace with a seating area for entertaining. The Formal dining room is adjacent to this beautiful kitchen with granite tile & new SS appliances and a lovely sitting area for coffee & conversations. Cozy family room/game room escorts you to the solarium with lovely natural light from 3 skylights and out to the covered patio which doubles as a viewing deck.
Private Rmks - DND2: Pool & Cool deck getting updated & repiared. Days on the market do to Buyer not being able to perform. Seller has architectural designs if desired, on request. New side by side refrigerator was installed after pictures were taken. Title was opened with Christy Nebeker First American Title cnebeker@firstam.com (480) 777-0051 2121 W Chandler Blvd, Ste 215 Chandler AZ 85224
Directions: I-10 to 7th Avenue North to Willetta Street; West to home on the South side of street.

Public Remarks: Charming two-story home with easy care landscaping! The bright interior welcomes you in with a foyer and living room with carpeted flooring, a soothing palette and ceiling fans. The kitchen boasts wood cabinets, tile backsplash, built-in appliances, a peninsula island & neutral tile floor. Dining area has access to the backyard through a sliding glass door. Head upstairs to a loft area, great as a hang out space or play area. The spacious primary suite includes a separate sitting room and bathroom with two walk-in closets and a two-sink vanity! The downstairs bonus room could serve many different uses. The inside laundry room has an abundance of shelves for extra storage!

Public Remarks: You'll love this gorgeous 4 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home on a huge lot with desert landscaping and North/South exposure. The formal living room and dining room are perfect for hosting guests, while the great room is perfect for relaxing with family. The home features stunning luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout. Your eat-in kitchen showcases granite countertops and a large island with breakfast bar. Walk through the great room to the spacious bonus/game room. Upstairs, you'll find a loft that's ideal for a home office or play area for the kids. The primary bedroom features a walk-in closet and private balcony, while the huge grassy yard is great for playing games or letting your dog run around. Plus, there's an HOA-approved shed to store all of your gardening tools and outdoor equipment!

Public Remarks: Fantastic 2432 square foot 4 bedroom and 3 bathroom home in a really great and private location at the end of the cul-de-sac. The home features beautiful wood floors and a wonderful gourmet kitchen with granite counters, stainless steel appliances, a granite kitchen island, stainless steel wall ovens, and a large pantry.  The kitchen opens up to the large family room with high vaulted ceilings.  The master bedroom and two other bedrooms are split from the fourth bedroom and third bathroom.  The front yard is beautifully manicured with grass, trees, and flowers and has a great appearance.  The parklike backyard has a large  covered patio, nice hardscape,  grass area.  The swimming pool completes the  private  entertaining backyard.  There is ample parking in the cul-de-sac for get togethers

Public Remarks: This very private & quiet gated 4 bedroom home has a fabulous lush grass yard with wonderful Mountain Views, mature vegetation and a delightful outside ramada. It features beautiful paneled cherrywood ceilings, wide archways, vaulted ceilings, wood floors & 2 stone fireplaces  creating a warm & inviting setting. Fully open for entertaining, the main rooms have generously proportioned living spaces. It has a charming farmhouse kitchen with brick wall areas, high ceilings & clerestory windows, a breakfast rm, center island, stainless appliances & Subzero fridge. The spacious master bdrm hosts a fireplace & sitting area, & the Backyard has dual covered patios and overlooks the salt water pool, BBQ station & ramada. Perfectly positioned near the Biltmore between Lincoln/Camelback corridor.
Directions: From Lincoln South on 32nd street west on   East San Miguel Ave, North on North 30th St. Property will be on the East.

Public Remarks: Welcome to The Collection: North Central, a premier gated community of 17 Luxe Single Family Residences located between the 7's on Northern Ave. Ready for delivery between Winter of 2022 and Spring of 2023, this community boasts gated entry, lush landscaping, stunning common areas, and heated community pool. With quartz countertops, soaring ceiling heights, large windows for ample natural light, and Wolf/ Sub Zero Appliances included in our base model, these modern masterpieces are unmatched! There are 4 plans available and will be released in phases. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own a new semi- custom home in the heart of Phoenix near some of the best shopping, dining, and nightlife that Arizona has to offer!

Legal Description (Abbrev): N2 SE4 NE4 NE4 EX E 40' RD AS PER DKT 1910/262  4.78 AC
Public Remarks: Private Ranch- Wow! This is not on a busy street, its an amazing 5 acre ranch west of the main, paved 7th St. and Honda Bow, short county dirt road to the fenced ranch with gated entry which shares the old Stagecoach road which originally led to Prescott for early settlers. This amazing ranch is zoned R43 for flexibility for multiple families or split off a portion for more homes, horses, RV garage, etc... the possibilities are endless with this self contained retreat with private well, 5000 water tank, windmill pump, solar with separate guest house, massive 4 car garage/ workshop. All surrounded by mtn. views everywhere- simply amazing property nestled in an area of much more expensive homes. Here's the best part- it's been maintained extremely well and improved with sand volleyball court
Private Rmks - DND2: Well may need to be re-drilled, seller only uses 5000 gallon water tank- hauled water less than $200.00 a month or estimated re-drill is $15,000 at buyers expense. This area is known to have very strong water pressure, buyer to verify at Arizona Department of of Water Resources or contact a local well driller. Seller currently has a friend staying in guest house, please do not disturb or enter
Directions: 7th Street N of Carefree Hwy. to Honda Bow. Turn left onto Honda Bow and turn left immediately onto 7th Street. Look for house number on gate post on west side of street.

Public Remarks: Infill development special! This opportunity is about the land and the location!    The historic property is a solidly built historic property, and represents an opportunity to fully rehab inside while also building multiple cash flow units on the rest of the parcel.    The historic home occupies only about 25% of the parcel, which is zoned R-3 Multiple Family Residential, leaving plenty of room to develop out and up! Build multiple income properties here!    Roomy parcels like this are very rare in Garfield these days and offer an opportunity to build homes in this very popular downtown neighborhood.    Seller was previously an agent.    Property being sold as-is.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 6 BLOCK 10 STORY ADDITION PLAT B MCR 000915
Public Remarks: The Grafton Mason Jr House in F.Q. Story Historic District of Phoenix is a rare Tudor style gem. Built in 1925 and placed on the National Register of Historic Places, this property has a unique whimsical charm and is offered with tremendous restoration potential. Original oak hardwood floors, gas fireplace and wall nooks finished with the original 1920's tile, high coved ceilings, plastered walls, and unique architectural design elements throughout. Separate guest house (the original carriage house from 1925) features a kitchenette and full bath, as well as a sleeping loft that is a conversion of the original hay storage bay. The current renovation design plans allow for a separate backyard entrance and private courtyard for the guest house, allowing great rental potential given the

The primary bedroom is roomy enough to fit all your furniture and offers private access to the backyard and a lavish bathroom w/jetted tub, dual vanities, & a walk-in closet. Desert-style backyard is perfect for relaxation on the heated spa or pool. Must see!!

Public Remarks: Amazing opportunity to own this fantastic home nestled on a cul-de-sac in the Ahwatukee Community! Inviting interior boasts soothing palette t/o, tile floors, & spacious living areas with shiny wood-look floors. If entertainment is on your mind, you'll love this perfectly flowing layout! The immaculate kitchen showcases plenty of counter space, white cabinets, wall oven, & a breakfast bar. Sizable main bedroom features soft carpet, ample mirrored-door closet, & a private bathroom. HUGE backyard with covered patio, sparkling blue pool, & tons of space for entertaining is ready to enjoy! Perfect spot for your gatherings!! You MUST see it. Call today!

Public Remarks: Adjacent to the foothills of South Mountain Preserve, Heard Farm is a stunning new community featuring 24 Modern Farmhouses that focus on elegance and a healthy lifestyle. The Single Story Mercury Plan offers 3588sf, 4 Bed/3.5 Bath/Office/3 Car Garage with soaring 22' vaulted ceilings and a 500sf Loft overlooking the enormous Great Room. The Mercury completely opens up for full entertainment with 16' glass multi-slide doors at the Front Porch and Covered Patio. A 440sf View Deck overlooks the Pool in the Backyard and takes full advantage of the sunsets with unobstructed mountain views. This home also features spray foam insulation, metal roof, custom glass garage door, barnwood texture facade, custom metal stairs and railings, and a 10' linear fireplace as the hearth of this luxurious home

Public Remarks: RARE, HISTORICALLY-DESIGNATED ESTATE IN THE HEART OF DOWNTOWN PHOENIX! This majestic 2-story estate built by H.P. Demund in 1905 has been immaculately maintained preserving its original historic charm to the highest level! The elegant home displays an exceptional attention to detail, with oak paneling and hand carved relief strips throughout the first floor and two large stone fireplaces. The property features a flowing floor plan with a welcoming foyer, striking staircase, beautiful wood-burning stone fireplace, large light and bright kitchen, and a large balcony! The property is 4,659 square feet, currently configured for a professional office consisting of 7 private offices, one conference room and a 1,553 square foot finished basement (included in total square footage). Interior

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 6002 AHWATUKEE ATV 2 LOT 6001-6089 TR A-E MCR 027116
Public Remarks: Welcome to this updated 3 bed, 2 bath home in the desirable Ahwatukee subdivision! Inside discover a large living room, new LVP floors t/out, fresh neutral paint for a bright interior, and vaulted ceilings that add to the spacious feel. Enter the eat-in kitchen to find stainless steel appliances, quartz counters, subway tile backsplash, recessed lighting, ample white cabinets, and a breakfast bar. Bay windows in the dining area & main bedroom for tons of natural light! Main bedroom has a walk-in closet and an ensuite with a separate tub/shower & dual quartz counter sinks. Out the back, you have space for BBQ and a cozy covered patio w/flagstone floors. Don't forget the playgrounds, sports courts, & other Community amenities for you to enjoy! Near I-10, 60, & 202 Freeways! Must see

Public Remarks: This gorgeous, 3 bedrooms, 2 bath, fully remodeled home needs to be added to your list of homes to see today! Fresh interior and exterior paint.  New tile flooring throughout the entire home, no carpet in any of the rooms! Upgraded dual vanity, walk in tile shower with large niche and block glass in the owner's suite with walk in closet. Guest bathroom completely remodeled with new tub/shower combo, new 36'' vanity with mirror.  Kitchen cabinets include upper cabinets with crown molding, countertops and kitchen sink with upgraded appliances, Stainless steel refrigerator, range, microwave and dishwasher included. New light fixtures throughout the home. Backyard has extended covered patio, pavers, granite and a shed for extra storage space.

Legal Description (Abbrev): W2 NW4 NE4 SE4 EX N 31.5' & EX W 31.5' RDS    4.31 AC
Public Remarks: Unique opportunity for horse and equestrian lovers to Build your dreams and take advantage of this extremely rare Property that has been in continuous operation since the 1960's.  Property consists of one 1,300 sq ft 3 bed/1 bath home, one 1,100 sq ft 2 bed/2bath home, one 500 sq ft casita with bath and kitchen. One Mare Motel with twenty plus15x15 stalls, one show barn with box stalls & two tack rooms. A 96' x 200' arena with other uses, 40' round pen. 6 large runs, 2 with shade. Situated on 4.31 acres with private water company, and an existing in-active private well on the property. Facility is in excellent condition and ready for new owner to take the business to the next level.  Buyer to verify all pertinent info.

N/S exposure, huge lot, hot tub and huge covered patio.    Desert Ridge is the place to be with world-class dining, shopping, golf, parks, trails, and incredible schools.

Public Remarks: Be the proud owner of this gorgeous horse property! All furnishings included. Great for short or long-term rentals, & AIRBNB.

Public Remarks: This amazing home has it all!  The open floorplan flows easily from the living room with a fireplace, dining, to the kitchen with a high end gas range.  The spacious downstairs bedroom and bath are separate from the upstairs 2 bedrooms & bath- creating a perfect private guest suite.  The French doors open from the kitchen & dining area to the spectacular oversized backyard featuring a large covered patio, refreshing saltwater pool and above ground spa, outdoor fireplace, Tuff Shed workshop w/electrical, RV gate & parking, beautiful landscaping, and spectacular mountain views.  It's an entertainer's dream! OWNED solar was installed in 2017 for extra energy efficiency.  The 2 car garage, corner lot, and excellent location are among the many things that make this home truly remarkable!

Public Remarks: QUICK MOVE IN!! BEAUTIFUL HOME BEING CONSTRUCTED in this rare, gated community in the Ahwatukee Foothills.  Popular open plan, dramatic iron entry door, Great lot backs up to desert mountain preserve.  Upgrades galore including gourmet kitchen with Kitchenaid 36'' gas cooking package and upgraded eclipse cabinets, Quartz counter tops and subway tile backsplash. Outstanding 15' sliding wall of glass at great room, modern rectangular sinks in all bathrooms plus freestanding tub and 7' shower with frameless glass enclosure at master bath. Laundry cabinets, 8' interior doors, large baseboards and much more. Wood look Tile planking throughout home. NOTE: Pictures shown are of model home.

This stunning home has upgrades galore and features a great floor-plan with a nice size living room, dining room and family room! The eat-in kitchen has quartz countertops, crisp white cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Your detached guest house is also updated and features a two bed, 1 bath floor-plan, making this the perfect home for hosting out of town guests or renting for additional income! There are beautiful wood-like tile floors and neutral-toned paint throughout. This home is conveniently located near shopping, restaurants, grocery stores, and nearby public transportation!

Public Remarks: VIEWS AND PRIVACY! This incredible residence, located in coveted Indian Hills ? and on a sought after street - is gently nestled in one of Phoenix's most sought after neighborhoods around Piestewa Peak. Gorgeous mountain/city views make this home a fan favorite. A desirable and spacious split and open floorplan ? with excellent natural light. Many updates set it apart to other offerings, including the upgraded kitchen with generous storage and opening graciously to the dining area. Both aesthetically pleasing and functional, the split floorplan is highly desirable for carefree living. Covered patio and a spectacular pool hallmark the well-designed backyard. Hiking nearly outside your front door. Easy access to freeways, restaurants, services and much more! Lock & Leave - low maintenance!

Public Remarks: Wow! VIEWS , Great opportunity to own this one-of-a-kind hillside property in the Community of Talasera! This gem offers a 3-car garage, stylish wood columns on the porch, & a delightful front yard. The interior boasts a designer palette & recessed lighting throughout. Enjoy the warmth of the gas fireplace in the bright living area w/media niche & speakers. A gorgeous dry bar & formal dining is also included! Impressive kitchen offers beautiful light fixtures, wood cabinets, SS appliances, a wine cooler, an island w/breakfast bar, & a pantry. Main suite has large windows, backyard access, & a lavish en suite w/jetted tub, dual vanities, & huge walk-in closet. The carpeted den w/dual French doors is ideal for an office! The resort-like backyard comes w/covered patio, infinity pool, lovely

Public Remarks: Are you tried of losing out on new builds or being put on a waiting list? Then you must check out this unique hillside luxury custom home with views of downtown Phoenix, downtown Tempe, downtown Mesa and downtown Scottsdale bordering south mountain preserve and located inside a gated community. 4800sqft living space with high end custom finishes, almost 7000sqft including covered patios and the 750sqft over-sized 3 car garage with water features around the property. Pool is optional and not included in current price. With the scarcity of vacant land available, the jaw dropping views, a cul-de-sac lot and just over 3/4 of an acre. This truly is a once in a lifetime custom new build opportunity. This one of the most premium lots in the subdivision. Don't miss out on this opportunity.

Public Remarks: Stylish & modern home fully remodeled by Downtown Phoenix. Secured by wrought iron fence with an electric opener, this home has new and refined touches throughout, and has plenty of warm natural light. Whether it's cooking in your modernized kitchen with its 36-inch real-wood cabinets, quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances, or getting ready in bathrooms that feature new vanities and tiling to the ceiling, you'll love all the finished touches.  Act now because this home will go fast!

Public Remarks: Imagine Communities is a brand new boutique gated community just south of the Biltmore and the ever popular Arcadia district. Our homes are designed for urban living with just the right amount of modern farmhouse style. We offer both 3 & 4 bedroom spacious designs with open floor plans. Homes range from 1688sqft all the way to 2167sqft. We've removed the guess work from the new home buying process and offer highly upgraded homes from the start, with white shaker cabinets, plush carpet, wood plank tile throughout the main floor and wet areas, two tone paint, stainless steel appliances, a farmhouse kitchen sink, quartz countertops, a butcher block island, huge walk-in closets, luxurious master bathrooms, 2 car garage and a private backyard all included as a standard!

Discover a beautifully maintained home featuring a cozy fireplace and highly upgraded cork flooring. The eat-in kitchen comes complete w/ appls, rich cabinetry, granite counters, & a center island. Upstairs main bedroom offers a walk-in closet & ensuite w/dual sinks & separate tub you'll definitely enjoy. Carpeted loft is perfect for entertainment. Delightful landscaped backyard is equipped with a covered patio, pavers, charming Pergola, & synthetic grass. A 2-car attached garage and inside laundry complete this lovely home. Copper Leaf subdivision offers community pool, & parks.

Public Remarks: Beautifully maintained & nicely updated 5 bed/ 3 bath + loft with 3 split Car Garages +RV gate & driveway, home in West Phoenix! Located on a premium North-south cul-de-sac lot that backs up to a green area. The home that features Formal Living, Dining & Family room, and granite counter tops every where. Kitchen Island, Stainless Steel Appliances, Cherry Cabinets, Casual Dining area all open to the spacious Family Room! You'll find 1 Bedroom and a Full Bath downstairs, and a Loft with a Study/Desk area, 3 large Bedrooms, a Full Bath, and a roomy Master Suite with a Shower & Tub combo, and a Walk-in Closet upstairs! The Covered Patio & Balcony overlooks the Backyard and backs to a green area! Great location close to West gate, parks, shopping, dining, Loop 101, & I-10 HWY.

Public Remarks: Welcome to The Collection: North Central, a premier gated community of 17 Luxe Single Family Residences located between the 7's on Northern Ave. Ready for delivery between Winter of 2022 and Spring of 2023, this community boasts gated entry, lush landscaping, stunning common areas, and heated community pool. With quartz countertops, soaring ceiling heights, large windows for ample natural light, and Wolf/ Sub Zero Appliances included in our base model, these modern masterpieces are unmatched! There are 4 plans available and will be released in phases. Don't miss out on the opportunity to own a new semi- custom home in the heart of Phoenix near some of the best shopping, dining, and nightlife that Arizona has to offer!

Public Remarks: You don't want to miss this well-maintained home in the Phoenix Historic District. No HOA. This immaculate interior 1951 home features 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, dual pane windows, 8120 square foot large lot. The single level welcomes you in the living room overlooking the beautiful backyard. You will enjoy entertaining with friends and family in this spacious kitchen with tons of storage, including a walk-in pantry. The property sits North/South so you can enjoy your patio year-round. Front and backyard desert landscaping were designed for easy maintenance. Front entrance has pavers extending to the curb and around side of home. Located just minutes from Golf courses, downtown and Phoenix Sky Airport. The Two car garage includes a workshop, storage of you finish to make an office or studio.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 15 MOON VALLEY LOTS 1-128, 146-339, TR A-E MCR 009201
Public Remarks: Incredible custom luxury home ready for you & your family. This beautiful home is nestled in the hillside in the very desirable Moon Valley neighborhood.  4-bedroom 4.5 bath home also has sizeable office that can be used as 5th bedroom and the sewing room off  the laundry room can easily be converted into a walk-in closet. The spacious kitchen features a Viking double oven, warming drawer, 6 burner gas top stove, plenty of storage & separate 36'' GE Monogram refrigerator, freezer.  Master bedroom features a pocketing glass wall that gives you breath taking sunset views. Vary spacious walking closet. The 1st floor basement has a gym, theater, game room w/wet bar . The down stairs bathroom also features has a six person sauna. Sit on the back patio & relax by custom fire/water

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 3 CASAS DE RANCHO VENTURA MCR 075827
Public Remarks: As soon as you walk up to this Lower Arcadia home, you will notice its charm and curb appeal. Entering through the front door and into the open concept living area you're welcomed to high 10' ceilings and a warm, vibrant feel! The great room concept is warming with the kitchen just off of the living area adorned with a great gas fireplace.  Built in 2006, this one-owner house feels like home. Upstairs you'll find 3 wonderfully appointed bedrooms, two full baths, and a powder bath. Downstairs in the fully built-out basement you'll find the oversized  secondary living room as well as another   bedroom and full bathroom. Just off of the great room you'll find yourself outside where you'll enjoy a wonderful covered patio overlooking a well maintained grassy lawn.  Come see it yourself!

HUGE backyard w/an expansive covered patio is ready for your creative touch!With room for a pool, you can make it a complete paradise. MUST SEE

Public Remarks: Situated in the coveted Arcadia Lite community of Phoenix and carefully crafted in 2016 by Rebuild the Block, this exquisite custom residence offers an RV gate + parking, no HOA, convenient access to the Loop 202 Fwy, Hwy 51, Scottsdale Fashion Square Mall, Phoenix Sky Harbor Airport, a plethora of restaurants, entertainment, nearby hiking/biking trails and so much more! Upon entry, the inviting open floor plan is enhanced with soaring ceilings, recessed lighting, engineered wood flooring, high quality finishes and an abundance of natural light. The gourmet kitchen is equipped with Carrera marble countertops, Six Square custom cabinets with crown molding, stainless steel appliances, a pot filler, imported lighting, a custom pantry door, EdgeStar wine fridge and a massive vented range hood.

Public Remarks: Fantastic opportunity for a great 4 bedroom home on a big lot with NO HOA, just 1.5 miles from GCU! This 4 bedroom 2 bath home has a spacious floorplan, with a formal living room, a family room with enough space for dining, a laundry room, and a large eat-in kitchen. The covered patio runs along the back of the home, giving you plenty of space to enjoy your huge cul-de-sac lot. You can enjoy the original features of this wonderful home, or remodel to make it your own. Either way, you don't find a property like this every day, and with NO HOA, the possibilities are endless.

Public Remarks: If you are looking to downsize into tiny home living, look no further! Charming fully remodeled 2 bed/1 bath home located in the highly sought after Coronado Historic District!! Minutes to downtown, Biltmore, Scottsdale, Tempe, Sky Harbor, and all the best restaurants and shops! Complete interior remodel including plumbing, electric, drywall, paint, dual pane windows, synthetic stucco, insulation, interior doors, and HVAC ducting. Durable plank laminate floors throughout. Bathroom includes a beautiful walk in shower and vessel sink. Kitchen features soft close shaker cabinets, designer backsplash, and quartz counters including a built-in breakfast counter! New stainless steel appliances and stub out for stack washer and dryer. One car carport could be easily enclosed into a garage.

Public Remarks: AN ENTERTAINERS DREAM! OPEN THE DOOR TO SOARING VAULTED CEILINGS INTO THE EXQUISITE GREAT ROOM AND KITCHEN. As a newer custom build this beautiful home is enhanced with new color schemes. decorator 3 tone paint, white Cordova cabinets, granite countertops, wood blinds, updated porcelain wood plank flooring, stainless steel appliances, high end AC units, Split floor plan with luxury 2 master suites. Public Remarks: Stunning new Avance home just hit the market at the base of South Mountain! This beautiful Loma plan 3 home has an open floor plan, 10 foot high ceilings throughout, bright windows, and upgraded luxury vinyl plank floors that resemble hardwood. The gourmet kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances, wooden cabinets, quartz countertops and a beautiful oversized island. One bedroom and bathroom is located downstairs for the convenience of out of town guests. The remaining three bedrooms and a loft are on the upper level, with breathtaking mountain and city views. The gated community features 7 neighborhood parks, a private fitness facility, a resort style pool and spa, a private outdoor yoga space, volleyball court and 50 miles of mountain trails. Home has almost 80k in upgrades!

Public Remarks: One of the absolute best in highly desirable Encanto, this iconic Monterey Revival home is a once in a lifetime opportunity. Originally built in 1935, this home features timeless traditional design and details including original hardwood flooring and beautiful millwork throughout. Fantastic and flexible floorplan with separate formal and casual living areas and 4-5 bedrooms. The chef's kitchen is large and features new Gaggenau appliances, a breakfast bar and built-in banquette. The home sits at the entrance to Encanto on a large nearly 1/2 acre pristinely manicured lot with expansive lawns for a family and intimate or large scale entertaining. The 3 car garage is hard to find in Encanto and the wine cellar is an outstanding bonus and with a separate exercise room, this home has it all!
Directions: From 7th Avenue and Encanto Blvd, West on Encanto Blvd to 9th Avenue, home is on the SE corner of 9th Avenue and Encanto Blvd

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 143 PRESERVE AT BOULDER MOUNTAIN MCR 061817
Public Remarks: Beautiful 6BR/3.5BA home in the desired community of Preserve at Boulder Mountain. Inviting, bright hallway welcomes you in a perfectly structured home with nicely aligned 3BR on the right side of the corridor, leading to an open, bright kitchen and family room. Enter the other side of the house to the left of the family room and find the master BR and 2 more BR. Private exterior features a tranquil backyard with grassy area. This premium lot backs to natural desert and gorgeous mountain views. Recently fresh-painted exterior, clean and well-maintained property with 3 car garage, this home shows pride of ownership and would perfectly accommodate a large family or be an opportunity for those looking to start an adult care business (home licensed for 5 residents). THIS IS A MUST SEE!

Public Remarks: Well cared for home in Arcadia Lite. This red brick charmer offers 3 bedrooms and 2 baths and is located in the Hopi school district. Enjoy a large living room, plus a family room with a vaulted wood beamed ceiling, and an office/AZ room. Lots of storage, a 2-car garage in the backyard, RV gate and covered parking with sewer hook-up. Mature citrus trees. Lots of new construction in the neighborhood. This home is move in ready or take it to the next level with a remodel or new build. Walking distance to numerous Arcadia area bars and restaurants!    RV gate with sewer connection.

Public Remarks: Don't miss this 3 bedroom/2.5 bath home with large loft (could be 4th bedroom). This is a great opportunity located near the 51 and 101 freeways and Desert Ridge shopping and dining. The kitchen has stainless steel appliances - fridge included, pantry and granite countertops with breakfast bar. Downstairs is also a large living room with vaulted ceilings and lots of natural light, family room with fireplace, dining area, 1/2 bath and laundry room. The slider leads out to a nice sized yard with manicured grass. Upstairs is a large loft perfect for a playroom, office, or enclose it for a 4th Bedroom. Primary Suite is spacious with walk in closet, double sinks, and tiled shower. Secondary bedrooms are also upstairs near another full bathroom. Low HOA. 2 car garage. Schedule a tour today!

Public Remarks: Looking for a new place to call home? This charming 3 bed, 2 bath residence nestled on a peaceful cul-de-sac is the one! New paint on exterior. Come inside to discover an inviting living area showcasing neutral palette, tile flooring, and a cozy fireplace ready to enjoy on chilly evenings. The immaculate kitchen offers ample wood cabinetry, recessed lighting, back patio access, and plenty of counter space for all your cooking needs. Have a good night's sleep in the primary bedroom featuring a sitting area w/wood paneling, and a private bathroom. You'll love hosting fun gatherings in the fantastic backyard with the extended covered patio, shimmering diving pool, amazing mountain views and tons of potential for customizing,  Don't let this opportunity pass you by! Act now!

Public Remarks: Welcome home! Rare opportunity to find an updated turnkey home like this in Moon Valley! Featuring 5 generously sized bedrooms w/ the Master on the 1st floor! Swim in your private pool in the backyard of one of the largest Cul De Sac lots in the subdivision @16,200ft! This desirable floorplan features high ceilings, tons of natural light, an oversized kitchen and built for a Car lover; 3 Car garage w/ epoxy floors & a 6+ car covered carport on the side! Close to everything the area has to offer shopping, dining, entertainment and centrally located for commuting anywhere in the valley!

Public Remarks: This highly pristine home Beautifully designed and located into gated community of Paradise Ridge Close to Mayo Clinic, Scottsdale Quarter and Kierland, with designer upgrades! Family room is open to kitchen and large sliding doors to the covered paver patio. Luxury, Master retreat w/king bed, large master bath w/ custom shower. Open floor plan, spacious living areas, lot of windows for natural light. Views of serene . Chef's kitchen w/Granite slab, s/s appliances, gas range. Close to shopping, restaurants & recreation.     Upstairs you will find a beautiful spacious master bedroom with a stunning master bath. Designer tile in the massive walk in shower with rain shower head. In the backyard you will find a large covered patio, lush green grass and plenty of space to add anything else!

Public Remarks: Welcome home to ''Gatsby on Griswold'' Located in North Central Phoenix specifically the highly demanded ''between the 7's'' where you will find some of the valley's most popular restaurants and shops along with the lush over 2 mile long bridal path. This 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom brand new home feel is a show stopper with a metal roof, paver walkway and driveway, large open floor plan with high end custom kitchen and bathrooms, tankless gas hot water heater, even the main sewer line has been replaced. The main living space flows right into the amazing kitchen with large picture windows, gas stove cooktop, wall oven, Bosch drawer microwave, bar area with beverage fridge and tons of cabinet space for all the extras. Enjoy dining inside or al fresco?

Public Remarks: Welcome home to this Equestrian Estate with amazing views! Experience the grand foyer. Discover the inviting living room with soothing palette, soaring ceilings, neutral stone floors, and a cozy fireplace to keep you warm and help entertain. The stunning kitchen and open floor plan with a plethora of natural light, offers many cabinets w/crown molding, sparkling SS appliances, granite counters, breakfast room, pantry, and a center island w/a breakfast bar. Home boasts of split floor plan with a master bedroom showcasing plush carpet, backyard access, lavish en-suite w/dual sinks, soaking tub, and a walk-in closet. Enjoy the spacious garage, desert landscape, and stone accents.  The massive backyard has a relaxing covered patio, spa, and a huge horse arena. Resort Style living!

Public Remarks: Amazing opportunity to own this charming home in an established Phoneix neighborhood! The property features a carport, detached garage, solar panels for low bills, 3 bedrooms, and a full bathroom. Enter to discover a well-cared-for interior featuring common spaces w/designer paint, wood-tile flooring t/out the home, and cozy fireplace for chilly AZ nights. The efficient kitchen has direct access to the back patio and offers ample cabinet storage, luminous granite counters, & essential appliances for your daily meals. The bedrooms are roomy, each with ceiling fans, and tons of natural light. Contemplate endless blue skies under the paver patio! Sizable backyard comes w/grass, a separate workshop/storage, and endless possibilities. This home is waiting for you! Make an offer today.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous Gated  light & bright single level 3/2 split floor plan that is turnkey and built in August 2021 & has mountain views. This home is truly stunning with gas range, White shaker cabinets throughout, quartz kitchen countertops, stainless steel appliances, 8' interior doors, subway tile in kitchen & owner's suite bathroom & neutral floor tile 12x24 in all area's excepts for bedrooms.. You'll love the large double sized patio slider for gracious entertaining and ambiance.  All windows have 2'' faux wood blinds, recessed lighting throughout, ceiling fans, smart home security system, gas tankless water heater and much, much more.  Near South Mountain Regional Park & Preserves, Sky harbor airport, Downtown & freeway Loop 202.

Public Remarks: Another SANTORINI LUXURY CUSTOM home in Arcadia! Nothing was missed for this family centric home. New Roof, Sprinkler, Anderson Windows. The lot is very large and can be added to for more bedrooms and enclose the garage too.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 14 DESERT RIDGE SUPERBLOCK 11 PARCEL 2 MCR 086149
Public Remarks: Fabulous Fireside @ Desert Ridge home w/ 4 Br/3.5 Ba, plus Casita w/separate entrance & full bath - ideal for visitors or office.  3-car garage (tandem) and resort-style backyard w/play pool, fountain & putting green.  Popular Asacha model floor plan.  Chef kitchen w/gas stove, SS appliances, granite counters, large panty, plus butler pantry, island seating, in-kitchen dining, plus formal dining room.  Office/den downstairs and loft upstairs.  Large master w/sitting room, his/hers vanity, sep. tub/shower & his/hers closets.  Laundry upstairs w/sink & storage cabinets.  Community center w/in walking distance & includes workout facility, sauna, lockers, sport courts, playgrounds, pools, rec room & much more.   Showing by appointment only - Tenant's Rights, please do not disturb.
Private Rmks - DND2: Tenant Rights thru 4/30/22.  Please do not disturb.  To minimize disruption to tenants, planning two Mini-Open houses - scheduled Saturday & Sunday, April 2nd & 3rd, Noon to 1:30 pm.   Walk-ins not welcome.  All buyers to be accompanied by agent - please call Lister to confirm attendance at either open house.  No sign on home.  No realtor lockbox.  File open @ Equity Title, Shandie Weant.
Directions: South on 40th St.  West (R) on Waller Lane.   South (L) on 39th Terrace.   West (R) on Half Hitch Place.  Home on south-side (L) of street.

Wood & Tile floors, Updated Plumbing & Electric, Newer kitchen appliances & Granite countertops, New W/D, All newer Pella Dbl Pane windows, HVAC, Water Htr, Roof & more! Back house (built in 2012 w/ city permit) is 900 sf. Spacious Living area & Vaulted ceilings, Separate Bed/Bath & Den. Don't miss the chance to make this home your own.

Have you been looking for a remodeled, cozy yet affordable home in a central location?  Well, if that were not enough, this home even offers a guest house with its own kitchenette and full size bedroom and bath!   The front home has been remodeled inside out and top to bottom with plumbing & electrical repairs, floor plan improvements, new modern kitchen & bathroom cabinets, quartz countertops and other modern finishes you would expect in the best of homes. Outside, the irrigated lot is full of endless possibilities due to its size and soft soil that is ready for you to plant your favorite trees. All offers are being considered so put your best foot forward and the best of luck to you!

Step out back and embrace any Sonoran season with the incredible backyard oasis featuring a sparkling pool, multiple covered and open air decks, grassy yard, and lush foliage. Do not miss this incredible opportunity.  Investors, you will like the current awesome tenant!

Situated on a 15,000+ parcel with lush grass, mature trees, and a private pool, this lot hosts a spacious 4 bedroom 4 bath 3358 sqft main home and detached 637 sqft guest casita with sleeping nook, kitchenette and full bathroom. The main house boasts an endless list of upgrades, including modern lighting and fan fixtures, floating vanities, Bianco Greco marble countertops, and the charm of exposed brick and Saltillo tile. The 2nd floor master retreat is a sight to be seen with vaulted wood beamed ceilings, herringbone hardwood floors, and large walk-in closet with built-ins. Enjoy brand new AC units, luxury appliances, custom cabinetry throughout and more

Public Remarks: Spectacular property! Perfect split floor plan with tile throughout, entering property you will find a welcoming area that makes its way to the large kitchen and spacious living room/dining room that boasts a beautiful brick fireplace. You will also find 2 spacious bedrooms with 1 bath. Fans in every room! The large front yard can be the canvas of your own beautiful garden. Covered driveway space with plenty of space for multiple vehicles. The large backyard has 2 side gates and RV gate! Perfect for entertaining as it already includes a gazebo with its own built-in gas grill. This beautiful brick home has had a fresh exterior paint job, making it look fresh and ready for its new owner!

Public Remarks: Stunning Mountain side custom home with amazing city and mountain views located in the premier community of gated Tapestry Canyon.  Elevated cul-de-sac lot with nice curb appeal, mature landscaping, impressive drive to home and elegant entry.  Great floorplan offers formal living with fireplace and large glass doors to views and entertaining patio.  Large, elegant dining room offers the same mountain and city lights views.  Gourmet kitchen with custom cabinets, stainless appliances and plenty of granite counters is open to large family room with fireplace.  Access outside through multiple sets of patio doors to pool, flagstone patios.  Split master suite has its own patio with spa and mountain and city lights view.  His and Hers closest, walk-in shower and soaking tub. Large secondary
Private Rmks - DND2: bedroom with walk in closet and Jack and Jill bath and large guest suite with private bath make for a great plan.  Executive office or 5th bedroom plus power add the utility of this plan.  Multiple patio areas with fireplace, pool, spa and canyon and City Lights views from all directions.  Oversized three cars with plenty of storage.  Excellent Foothills location, award winning Kyrene schools!
Directions: North on Desert Foothills Parkway to Tapestry Canyon gate (Desert Willow Drive), East to 17th Place, North to property

Main bdrm has private bath, walk-in closet & separate exit to Az room. Some designer touches like upgraded baseboards, LPV flooring, hardware on cabinets and doors, modern paint upgrades provide a modern vibe. Invite your friends and family to relax in the Az room year-round & still have plenty of space in the backyard. Indoor laundry room and a garage where you can actually fit a large truck! Wonderful location and move in ready! Welcome Home!

Public Remarks: 72 Hour Home Sale! Want to be a homeowner is the most sought after 85018 zip code. Come check this stunning modern home out. Sprawling open floor plan with high ceilings and tons of bright light, opening to a backyard that is an entertainers dream! NO HOA - perfect for income producing or as an investment opportunity. Smart home controlled from your phone by Nest, Hue, and other apps. Massive master suite complete with an oversized bathroom and walk-in closet. Split floor plan complete with En-suite bedroom and two add'l guest bedrooms and bath. Pool, jacuzzi, outdoor bar and fire pit! Hurry won't last long!

Public Remarks: Absolutely gorgeous, Arcadia style  remodel from top to bottom.  Some of the finishes you would only see in custom homes - farm sink, low profile gas stove & tankless hot water heater.  The soft modern pallet will compliment any decor - Kitchen features white, ceiling height cabinets w/grey accent cabinets on your island.  Low profile stainless appliances, recycle/trash center, soft close drawers, subtle subway tile & quartz counters. Master bath has dual vanity & walk in shower. Plank flooring thru out.  All big ticket items updated in fall 2021 & early 2022 - windows, roof, stucco, AC/heating, fencing, landscaping, gar door & fencing, electric panel & wiring.    No HOA, RV gate & plenty of room for your boat or toys.  Oversized, easy care yard w/artificial turf & citrus. Extra storage
Private Rmks - DND2: Please use Dina Shroth at Pioneer Title - seller has a hold open title policy.  dina.shroth@ptaaz.com.  480-661-3899.    Agents, please add to contract that seller holds a Arizona real estate license.      No need to rush out to show - contracts will be reviewed on April 3 at 1 pm, not before.
Directions: From Bell, North on 44th Street - West on Villa Rita

Legal Description (Abbrev): PT SE4 SEC 28 BEG AT PT ON WLY LN SD SE4 79.5F FR NW COR SD SE4 TH S 338.25F TH E 220F TH N 196.75F
Public Remarks: Phoenix Country Club's 6th Green is home to this one of a kind Sonoran Contemporary residence. Anchored by HH Green's historic Adobe architecture (reflecting his treasured Heard Museum design), the step-free primary home offers 5 bedrooms, 4 1/2 baths PLUS today's thoughtful auxiliary extras. The original 2-sided stone fireplace, is center to the dual Great Rooms' easy flow - inside & out - & into the recent Island Kitchen, adjacent to the grand wainscoted Dining Room. This enchanting environment's Day to Night transitions are pure magic! Private Guest Residence w 2 full baths is a thoughtful, addition. Recent infrastructure (plumbing, electric, roofing, windows, & more), ensures years of worry-free enjoyment. Privacy & Urban Convenience redefined in this romantic treasure.
Directions: East to Country Club Manor gated entrance. South, through the gate. Just inside the gate, the residence's private gate is on your immediate right. Proceed west to front entrance, facing Golf Course.

New laminate wood floors throughout (no carpet!), upgraded baseboards, ceiling fans, recessed lighting, no popcorn!, upgraded windows, fresh interior and exterior paint, new water heater...the list goes on and on! Public Remarks: Best view without any lot premiums or bidding wars for a home that backs up to a greenbelt ! Perfect 3bed/2.5 Home just in time for Summer in a gated community with Pool & Spa, Bike / walking paths, Basketball Court, Multiple Playgrounds for kids, large perfectly manicured green areas, absolutely stunning home from ceiling to floor. Neutral colors through the home. Tile flooring in the main living areas. Amazing kitchen with upgraded cabinets & counter tops, stainless steel appliances, large kitchen island, recessed lighting, and large double sink. Ceiling fans throughout. Master bath suite offers separate shower and large double sink vanity. 2-Car Split Garage, Cozy patio and easy access to the Community Park. This home is sure to go fast, schedule your showing today.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 6 VILLAGE AT NORTH GLEN MCR 131230
Public Remarks: This charming home sits in a privately gated community of just 40 homes. The open concept downstairs features upgraded wood-like flooring, a stunning kitchen with white cabinetry, beautiful hardware and prestine countertops. The large windows and sliders provide an airy, light and bright feel to the home. The upstairs features three bedrooms including the master oasis with it's own master bath. There is an additional spacous bath upstairs. The private backyard is a blank slate with endless design possibilities. Community features a private pool and sustainable edible landscape! Close to freeways, historic downtown Glendale, restaurants, shops, GCC, GCU, and tons of entertainment!     Take a look at the Matterport virtual tour link attached.

Public Remarks: Prepare to be impressed by this beautiful 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom ranch style home in the highly desired Mountains Trails community. This home offers a bright and open interior, complete with a spacious great room and a den - perfect for an at-home office. You'll love the immaculate desert landscaping in the front yard and grassy backyard, as well as the covered patio - perfect for enjoying Arizona's beautiful weather! The kitchen comes fully equipped with granite countertops, a large island with breakfast bar, sleek black appliances and a walk-in pantry. The primary bedroom features dual sinks, a walk-in closet, and a separate tub and shower. Your new home is located nearby dining, shopping, golf, hiking trails and more! Don't miss out on this incredible home - come see it today!

Public Remarks: Location, Location! Located on a small cul-de-sac street with beautiful mountain views from the front and back. No one located behind the house gives this house great privacy! This 3 bed/2.5 bath is sure to make you feel right at home. New granite countertops and freshly painted cabinets really bring a warm feeling to the kitchen. Great exposure of real reclaimed barn wood brought in from Kentucky make these accent walls something you can't buy at the Lumber store. Heading up to the master you'll find a big private patio. Upstairs you have all 3 bedrooms and a nicely sized loft! Come see this gem for yourself!

Public Remarks: UNICORN ALERT: This immaculate FOUR STORY Art Deco-inspired home built in 2017, located in the popular Triangle neighborhood of Downtown Phoenix near the Grand Avenue and Roosevelt Row Arts Districts, is a delightful juxtaposition between old and new.    The ground/1st floor could be used as a separate work/studio space or guest quarters, but is also well-equipped (and zoned) to lease for extra income as a studio apartment. This generous space has a separate entrance to Fillmore St with a generous patio and includes a queen size Murphy Bed, kitchen, separate bathroom, full-size W/D, and plenty of storage space.    The main house is accessible through the private gate with well-manicured vegetation.

Public Remarks: Beautiful remodeled home with 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms in the quiet community of Ben-Jo Estates. Kitchen has been beautifully done with granite countertops and stainless-steel appliances including built-in microwave, stove, and dishwasher. Large kitchen and dining area that leads to a spacious backyard with an attached workshop. Other updates include newly remodeled bathrooms and fresh paint inside and out. The home is minutes from Esteban Park which offers lighted baseball field and basketball court, playground, picnic area and much more. This community is close to restaurants, shopping and entertainment and has easy travel access to I10. This home is a must see!

Public Remarks: 72 Hour Home Sale. 55+ Community. There are many reasons to love this home, let us count the ways... it's in a good quiet tucked away location - it's clean and spacious - it's got a nice large yard with mountain views in several directions - it backs to a wash which adds privacy - it has a nice storage shed that stays - all of the  appliances stay - there is a clubhouse with scheduled social activities and a swimming pool - its interior is newly painted - the bathrooms have been updated - it has a bonus room that could be dining room, family room or studio -  it has ceiling fans throughout - it has two walk-in closets - there is nice storage space in the carport storage room -best of all, it is move in ready. That's 14 reasons but there are more, you'll have to come see it.

You're going to enjoy the relaxing comfort of this nicely done custom home with it's beautiful views of Desert Hills, Anthem, and desert mountains. 4 Huge bedrooms and 3 & 1/2 bathrooms with genuine stone tile throughout (bedrooms are carpeted). Public Remarks: Want to be inspired when you're home? Now you can be!!! This free flowing, well-lit custom remodel renovated by owner/agent is perfect for you! The designer kitchen has a wood accent coffered ceiling, an oversized island with bar seating, quartz countertops, modern white shaker cabinetry & stainless steel appliances. The bathrooms have custom vanities & tile in the bath areas. Neutral paint, wood floor tile & recessed lighting throughout, increase the home's appeal. The huge lush backyard is ideal for relaxing in or hosting a large party. A fully functional casita allows you to accommodate parents/friends or create short term rental income. Close to plenty of restaurants & hiking, the 51 & 202 freeways, the airport, Desert Botanical Garden, Heard Museum. Make this home yours today!!!

Public Remarks: Introducing this charming, 3 bed, 2.5 bath home nestled on a cul-de-sac in the beautiful Mountain Park Ranch Community! Delightful inside greets you with a wood-burning fireplace in the great room and high vaulted ceilings that make entertaining a breeze. The fantastic kitchen comes with oak cabinets, SS appliances, and fluorescent lighting. Off of the kitchen, you'll discover a cozy family room where you can unwind after a busy day. Gorgeous primary bedroom is located downstairs and has double entry doors, access to the backyard, and private bath w/double sinks. Spend fun summer days in the backyard enjoying the deck, covered patio, blue pool, and green grass area. Look no further! Call to schedule a private showing now!

Public Remarks: Need lots of room to spread out? This 7.284 acre property on Maricopa County land (no HOA!) includes an existing hillside home and detached workshop on 3.276 improved acres with utilities, including Town of Cave Creek water service! There is plenty of room to build a new custom home, guest house, garages for cars, RV's, boat, projects, and to stable your horses. Close to Phoenix, Cave Creek, Scottsdale, and Lake Pleasant but with that peaceful rural feel. You can keep it all for yourself or subdivide it into 1-acre parcels. Attention Builders! You know there are very few properties like this still available with city water!  Come tour this property, see it for yourself, and imagine the possibilities! Please note: This offer is for three (3) contiguous properties totaling 7.284 acres.
Directions: South on 10th St., up and over the hill, look for paved driveway and property address sign on the right (west) side of 10th St.

Public Remarks: Don't miss showing this beautifully maintained home in the desirable Madison School District! This is truly an amazing home offering beautiful custom finishes throughout: crown molding, granite counters, travertine tile in the bathrooms, dual pane windows with woow plantations shutters. Open great room area, spacious kitchen, with plenty of counter space & plenty of storage for your kitchen appliances.Dining room off the kitchen area, Large room addition off the kitchen with gas fireplace & french doors to allow plenty of natural light in.One car garage with direct access to inside the home. Plus a storage shed attached to the home. RV gate opens to a concrete slab conveniently located next to storage shed.

Public Remarks: The Tyler is truly the ultimate home! A 4 Bed/ 3 Bath single story modern home with a 4 Car/RV Garage and a private Gen Suite takes today's standards of living to a whole new level. The Tyler is a wonderful contribution to the Heard Farm Community in the SOMO District featuring a View Deck to enjoy unobstructed sunsets and mountain views. A large Kitchen of this home opens to the Front Porch bar area. The Great Room sets a new bar for entertaining with 18' ceilings, clerestory windows, 10' linear Fireplace, and multislide doors extending the livable space to the Covered Patio. The private Dining room also features glass doors connecting to the landscape to enhance intimate dinner parties.

Public Remarks: Looking for more than just a house?  Opportunity knocks with this rare set up of multiple structures and wide open spaces, all located in one of the best areas of the valley!  Main house is a spacious two story with 5 beds/2.5 baths plus a bonus room.  Separate detached 900 sq/ft studio consists of a huge main room plus 3 smaller rooms - all perfect multi-use spaces for an artist, collector, home office or almost anything you can imagine (rental prohibited) - all this within minutes to the 51, downtown or Biltmore area.  Over 1/3 Acre lot offers unparalleled possibilities with grass in the fenced backyard (perfect for pets or kids), a large circular drive in front plus enough space on the West side to store ALL of your toys, RV, Boat, Trailers or even build a lap pool!

Public Remarks: You can have a little slice of heaven when purchasing this beautiful 3 bedroom home,  adjacent to the most beautiful green belt in the valley. Completey secluded with a privacy wall that is a backdrop to a stunning custom design yard.  The yard features mature desert water resistant plants,  with a water system in both front and back.  First impression is a must when entering the front door,  with 20'' Tuscany tile throughout the main areas.  Cathedral ceiling,large  family  kitchen, SS appliances and laminate floors in two of the three bedrooms.  There is a double side gate for RV parking .  Back yard barbecue is not built in and does not convey.    Don't miss this one!!!!

Public Remarks: Don't miss this Incredible opportunity to buy a piece of history. This home was build in 1949 and remodeled/expanded in 1980 to 5 bedrooms and 3 baths sitting on what was once a grape vineyard. The Sanderson Special once grew on this parcel of land. The property was recently split from 2.377 acres to 1.139 as it currently sits today. The neighboring home can also be purchased to create an estate in this quiet area on 11th Ave.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 31 FOOTHILLS CLUB WEST PARCEL 15D MCR 052408
Public Remarks: Located in the Hillside gated community of Summerhill, this custom luxury estate has it all! Gorgeous exterior with tumbled paver driveway, patio. Welcomes to the 7,200+ sq ft home which has 6 bedrooms, executive office, 4 full bathrooms and 3.5 powder rooms plus a basement MADE for entertaining that includes a wine cellar, quarter-circle bar, two bedrooms and Fireman's poll to get you from upstairs to down! Enter through the custom wood door into a grand foyer. Turn left into a formal living room with gas fireplace and a wide in-line pocket door that brings the outside in. Wolf 6 burner gas stove, pot filler, built-in GE Profile Microwave, GE Monogram SS Refrigerator, LG Dishwasher and an endless kitchen island, breakfast room and kitchen bar!

Public Remarks: Bring the toys!!  Large lot, quiet setting - no HOA!! This stunning estate features an exquisitely remodeled and beautifully appointed custom home with designer finishes!  The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream with wall ovens, induction cooktop, range hood, two sinks, coffee station, pantry, wine fridge and center island.  The estate-like front yard features a circular driveway to greet your guests, a 2 car garage and a separate drive to the gated side entry with a 10x14 shed and plenty of space to park the toys! - The resort-like back yard features a large diving pool, pergola, outdoor seating, grill and bar areas - an entertainer's paradise!    This home is a MUST SEE!

Public Remarks: The ''Circular Sun House'' was designed by Frank Lloyd Wright and was his FINAL DESIGN, and known  as the Norman Lykes House, built in 1967. Designed to blend in with the curves of the surrounding desert mountain, this iconic masterpiece was the last home designed by Wright and one of only 14 circular homes by the master architect. Overlapping concentric circles create a floorplan that flows seamlessly from one room to another while every room takes in unobstructed majestic views of Palm Canyon and the city below. Curved walls, clad in golden-hued Philippine mahogany cover the three bedrooms and hallway, reflecting the natural light of Palm Canyon. Sprawling entertaining spaces flow outside to ample patios and a crescent-shaped pool. See video on Architectural Digest!
Private Rmks - DND2: This home was designed shortly before the completion of Frank Lloyd Wright's Guggenheim Museum in NY.    Renovated in 1995. In 2019, four new Trane AC units. The kitchen is plumbed for gas (propane). New induction cooktop.     For a private showing, contact the listing agent.
Directions: North of Lincoln on 36th Street to top of hill, property will be on your left.

Public Remarks: Here it is! This one has it all! 4 Bedrooms! 3 Full baths! 2 car garage! Beautifully remodeled! Location Location Location! What a charming home on a quiet street. Private backyard with room to build a pool if desired. Other features include a stone fireplace, huge accessory building/workshop in the backyard and almost new appliances included! Did we mention newer windows and doors? What about the newer roof and A/C unit? Gas cooking, heat and hot water too. Homes like this are impossible to find today. Trader Joe's and Whole Foods are right up the street as well as the 51 freeway and all the shopping that the Camelback corridor has to offer. See feature sheet for all the details. Don't wait on this one!

Public Remarks: Super amazing over the top acre plus custom home with really spectacular views south of carefree highway.  This home has it all, including attached RV garage, movie theater ,8 foot knotty alder doors through out, tumble chiseled travertine and all the finishes you would come to expect for a hillside compound with this location.  Adjacent to the Phoenix Sonoran Preserve so lots of biking and hiking trails for miles right off of your property.  The most impressive part about this property is the location, perched at the top of the hill south of carefree highway boasting some of the best views the north valley has to offer.
