The home has everything you'll want: HUGE accordion glass patio doors, a massive living room and expansive kitchen with lots of storage and counter space. Public Remarks: **JUST COMPLETED**A unique opportunity awaits in uptown Phoenix at 5 North. With cool modern farmhouse and bungalow architecture, this last remaining home is one of only five homes built on this street. This Residence Two plan is located on an oversized premium lot and features double stacked shaker cabinets in the kitchen, wood on the main floor, built-in 36'' gas stainless cook-top with wall oven, microwave and dishwasher, quartz countertops, tiled backsplash in the kitchen and tiled showers and bath tub surrounds. Front yard landscaping included with a pavered driveway and charming front porch. Just bring your porch swing!    Conveniently located near the 51 freeway and Bethany Home Road, explore the distinctive shopping and dining experiences just minutes from your doorstep.
Private Rmks - DND2: Purchase agreement written on builders forms. Home ready for immediate occupancy.
Directions: Bethany Home to Maryland, West on Maryland to 14th Street, North on 14th Street to Sierra Vista. Fifth home on right.

Public Remarks: New single story 2020 build w/NO HOA features a transitional and timeless design in the heart of Arcadia living! Located in one of the trendiest neighborhoods of Arcadia, walking distance to hot spots like OHSO, JT's & so many more, bike the AZ canal to all the best dining & shopping, hike camelback, minutes from Old town Scottsdale, Biltmore, Sky Harbor Airport, Downtown Phoenix & A rated schools. This N/S exposure 4bd/2 1/2 bath home+BONUS ROOM features a split primary floor plan, great room with fireplace, custom trim work to include crown molding, wainscoting, garden window, custom TruStone throughout the bathrooms w/rainhead showers, tongue&groove on both front courtyard & back patio, tankless water heater, water softener, oversized 771 sq ft garage, RV parking & sewer connect,

Public Remarks: This beautiful home sits atop the mountain & near the preserve! Awesome views along w/ peace n quiet.  4 Large Bedrms one of which is a Mother-In-Law suite along with 3 Full bathrms.  2 Walk-In pantrys: 1 in kitchen & 1 in the oversized Laundry rm. Open flowing floorplan- great for entertaining both indoors and outdoors. Kitchen opens to the fam rm, has granite counters, SS appliances, double ovens, walkin pantry.  Mtn Views from all parts of the home no matter which room you are in.  Master bedrm is large with view of mtns, pool, mtn preserve and more.  Master bathrm has double separate sinks, soaker tub, walk in shower along with private toilet & bidet room.  Closet is very large w/ various shelving. Mother-In-Law suite is spacious with views of the bkyd, pool & mountains.

Public Remarks: Completely Remodeled home with Open Concept floor plan. New tile throughout. New Kitchen Cabinets with marble counters, undermount sink and new Appliances.  New bathroom cabinets, new Tub, new shower. Newly painted inside/out. Crown molding in kitchen, family room & Bedrooms. Newly installed Roof, New water heater, Paver Stone Driveway & much, much more...  Centrally located in Paradise valley mall area close to the 51 freeway. short drive to Kierland mall, Desert ridge Mall. Fast trip to Biltmore/Camelback Corridor area, City of Phoenix & Sky harbor Airport. Why live in a Condo??? When you can have Single detached home with a huge backyard for the pets & hobbies. Large covered patio, storage shed & a 1 car garage. Bring your fussiest Buyer's. They will love this Gorgeous Remodeled Home.

Public Remarks: Incredible opportunity to own an impeccably designed, modern ranch home located on one of the best streets in Arcadia Lite! Upon entering the home through the custom glass pivot door, you'll find an open floor plan featuring an 18' kitchen island with Staron waterfall counters, ribbon mahogany cabinetry, polished concrete floors, sandblasted feature walls, and solid-wood bedroom pivot doors. A wall of glass highlights the backyard living areas featuring a custom designed pool, succulent garden, steel gas fireplace, newly built gazebo and RV gate. Additional improvements include automatic window shades, Nest & Ring systems, newer roof, A/C and water heater. Located within walking distance to Postino WineCafe, Le Grande Orange, Ingo's and many other Arcadia hotspots!

Public Remarks: This beautiful custom remodeled home with guest house! The main house is approximately 3,000, 5 oversized bedrooms, and 3 bathrooms.  Guest suit is just over 1,700 sq feet, 4 bedrooms, and 2 bathrooms. The home has all the desirable features complete with tile floor, plantation shutters, custom cabinets and stainless steel appliances. Spacious open floor plan is perfect for any family and entertaining. The property sits on over an acre of land and the backyard has been beautifully redesigned for your outdoor enjoyment which includes a custom pergola to keep you cool. All this plus huge 3 car garage and 5 RV gates.  Hurry this will not last!

Public Remarks: Come see this gem! Quintessential ranch style home has all the charm of its history with the beauty of a fresh remodel. 4br 2ba in the heart of Hacienda Del Campo the most sought after nook of lower Arcadia. 5min to OldTown Scottsdale 10min to SkyHarbor. Stunning European white oak hardwood floors, strikingly beautiful Brazilian quartzite oversized kitchen Island, large custom accordion sliding glass doors that open to the back patio. Open concept, vaulted ceilings, walk-in pantry, custom-made/vintage barn doors, large master walk-in closet, corner lot, quiet friendly neighborhood, no thru streets, beautiful views of Camelback Mtn, handmade shutters, new roof, fresh paint, low-VOC/nontoxic remodel, St.Augustine grass, mature color-changing trees, tree swings, private patio off master.

THIS BEAUTIFUL 3 BEDROOM 2 BATH HOME BOASTS SO MANY NICE FEATURES INCLUDING TILE FLOORING, GRANITE COUNTERTOPS, UPGRADED DOORS, DESIGNER PAINT INSIDE AND OUT., GREAT CURB APPEAL AND A HUGE FRONT YARD AND BACK YARD. HOME HAS CONVENIENT CABLE AND OUTLET BOXES FOR EASY INSTALL OF TV's. THE INSIDE LAUNDRY ROOM IS SPACIOUS FOR YOUR STORAGE NEEDS. THE LONG DRIVEWAY AND CARPORT PROVIDE PLENTY OF PARKING SPACES. TOUR THIS LOVELY HOME, IT'S A GEM!!

Public Remarks: This beautiful Arcadia-lite home has the finish-level and feel of today's modern farmhouse. From the hardwood floors to the quartz countertops, the design is on trend and clean as can be. With four en suite bedrooms, including one in the attached casita, the floor plan is thoughtful with room enough for everyone. The primary bedroom downstairs is separate from the others and full of natural light. Upstairs, you'll find two more bedrooms and an open loft space for work or play. The gas range in the kitchen will delight and challenge every chef. The interior courtyard and fire pit are perfect for Arizona's balmy evenings. No HOA! This one is definitely worth a look.

Ideal for any lifestyle, this home lives big w/ a Great Room, Living Room, Dining area & Bonus Room. Public Remarks: Incredible home perfect for the multi-generational family or an amazing investment opportunity to live in main hm and rent out three other units!  Main house is 3bd/1ba (1184 sf); front apt is attached to main hm and is 1bd/1ba (400 sf), and the detached guest casita is perfect for guests or AirBnb (169 sf)! These are 2020 NEW BUILDS! Plus there is a fully renovated 440 sq ft mobile - all 4 units have rented MTM. Well appointed w/new appliances, faux wood flooring, light fixtures & fans t/out. Beautiful grounds w/extended patios & charming courtyard spaces make for a cozy home feel instead of apt like setting. Impeccable workmanship, many upgrades and zero shortcuts here! Near the foot of Shaw Butte and North Mountain, parks and I-17, restaurants & schools make for easy access everywhere!

Public Remarks: Welcome to your new home! Steps off the JW Marriott golf course in the Desert Ridge Community. This home welcomes you to soaring ceilings, a gas fireplace, herringbone tile flooring, amazing natural light, newly painted, and split spacious bedrooms. New tankless water heater. New AC units. Freshly redone cabinetry, new bathrooms/showers, new appliances, double ovens, new fixtures, and an island/breakfast bar creates the kitchen you have dreamed of. The master suite includes a sitting area and private exit to the balcony with great mountain and golf course views. The ensuite is complete with double sinks, walk in shower with new tub, private toilet, and grand walk in closet. Enjoy your outdoor fireplace + TV in your shimmering heated swimming pool, or barbecuing with friends and family.

Public Remarks: Gorgeous 4 bed, 3 bath, 9087 sqft corner lot residence in Lakewood. Completely remodeled with impressive interior featuring vaulted ceilings, tile floors, neutral palette, plantation shutters, updated lighting and plumbing fixtures. New Anderson windows, New Trane AC units, remodeled kitchen, bathrooms, laundry and pool! The beautiful eat-in kitchen boasts cherry cabinets with crown molding, recessed lighting, SS appliances, mosaic backsplash, granite counters, breakfast bar and picture windows overlooking the backyard oasis. Main suite showcases plush carpet, a private bathroom with granite dual sinks, & WIC.  Insulated garage with epoxy floors. Fabulous backyard with covered patio, sparkling blue pool, high end fog system, basketball court, RV gate & tons of space for entertaining.

Public Remarks: 72 Hour Home Sale This 5-bed, 3-bath offers a lush green scenery,& a 3-car garage. Inside, discover an impressive interior that boasts neutral palette, stone floor, & plantation shutters. Spacious living/dining room, ideal for entertaining guests! The generous-sized family room features a fireplace perfect for cold winter nights. Chef's kitchen is fully equipped w/aesthetic light fixtures & track lighting, a plethora of wood cabinets, granite counters, SS appliances, a center island w/breakfast bar, & an elegant breakfast nook. Comfortable primary retreat features soft carpet, a lavish ensuite w/glamorous dual sinks, jetted tub, & a walk-in closet. Amazing backyard includes a covered patio, built-in BBQ, & sparkling pool. Don't just imagine it! Get an appointment today! Ask for video

Public Remarks: A rare opportunity to remodel or build your dream home in this ideal North Central location. Surrounded by new construction and million dollar homes, this 3,185 SF 5 bed 2.5 bath home on an .369 acre lot has good bones and loads of potential. Formal living rm, dining rm, family rm, eat-in kitchen and huge AZ rm provide plenty of space to entertain. The 5th bedroom is split from the other bedrooms and has its own bath making it a perfect office, guest or caretaker's suite. The yard is very private and includes mature landscaping, a beautiful tiled pool and plenty of space to play or garden. Located within the highly desired A+ Madison School district and close to prestigious private schools. Enjoy walking/biking along the bridle path to the Farmer's Mkt and popular N. Central restaurants.

Public Remarks: Mid Century Modern meets Farmhouse chic in this beautifully remodeled north Phoenix cul de sac home. Lots of character and personal touches. Close to the 51 with gorgeous views of Piestewa Peak and close to Trail 100. Great location with easy access to Scottsdale, Paradise Valley and metro Phoenix. Big back yard with mature trees, pavers, mountain views and diving pool. Split floorplan with family room, 2 bedrooms and bath on one side and  additional family room, 3 bedrooms and 2 baths on opposite side. New modern kitchen, new flooring, newer roof and a/c, resurfaced pebble sheen pool, new variable speed pump and cartridge filter. Paradise Valley Schools! No HOA! This is a must see!

Public Remarks: Stunning NEWLY-BUILT home in the upcoming Camelback Ranch gated community awaits you! Boasting 2952 SF of living spaces in a sought-after floor plan, this beauty looks larger than it is. Bright and welcoming interior features trending grey palette, gorgeous wood tile flooring t/out the main areas,  & recessed lighting. Enjoy entertaining in the beautiful kitchen perfectly flowing into  the family room w/tons of rich espresso cabinetry, granite counters, backsplash, SS appliances, and a HUGE island w/breakfast bar, in addition to a cozy nook. Main bedroom gives you carpet flooring, and lavish en suite w/dual sinks, jetted tub, separate shower, & walk-in closet. Outback is a covered patio, & a dirt yard. This very clean and move-in ready home is where you would want to be! Stop by today!

Public Remarks: The family neighborhood of Montecito, just south of the Biltmore area is convenient to shopping, entertainment, restaurants, the 51 and so much more! This home has been well kept and features slate tile in the front room & kitchen, 2-tone paint, ceiling fans throughout, updates in the master & hall baths, and a guest suite with separate entrance. The kitchen boasts a tile backsplash, SS side by side fridge, and a gas range with a SS range hood. The generous sized family room has vaulted ceilings and double doors leading out to a screened AZ room that is perfect for entertaining all year round! The guest suite has entry from the AZ room and the back yard! It is perfect for multi generational use and has a kitchenette and 3/4 bath. Did we mention the RV gate, No HOA & working swamp cooler??

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 34 ANTHEM COUNTRY CLUB UNIT 4 AMD-COG HILL MCR 049025
Public Remarks: This beautifully upgraded and appointed Rochester model home is a MUST see! Both the interior and exterior are an entertainers dream: From its spectacular kitchen with an unbelievable pantry and roomy work and eating areas; to its outdoor private oasis with with room for all your friends and family to visit, spread out and even prepare and serve meals. The luxurious and gorgeously updated Owners' Suite boasts a huge sleeping area, two walk-in closets, separate areas for two that include two sinks, loads of updated counter and storage space, an updated tub and a huge two-person  shower. The oversize guest rooms all have plenty of room for a queen size bed and are perfect for guests and/or family. Owned Solar! Don't miss this rare opportunity to own one of the largest homes in Anthem.

Legal Description (Abbrev): FOWLER TRACT MCR 10-7 E 152.6F OF N2 LOT 172 EX  E 27F
Public Remarks: Check out this fantastic 3 bedroom 2 bath remodel in the Coronado district with no HOA.  The kitchen has gorgeous marble like granite counter with a waterfall edge and  new  stainless steel appliances. Luxury vinyl flooring runs through the entire home. The master bedroom has a walk in closet, double vanities with matching counter tops, and a separate tub / shower area with new marble tile. The backyard is very private with mature trees, grass area and plenty of green.  You'll love the nearby restaurants, shopping, and more. Enjoy the great location in this historic area while living in a new updated modern style home. Schedule your showing today!
Directions: From the 10 head north on 16th to Sheridan and make a left. Turn right on 12th.  House will be on the left.

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 37 BLOCK K BILTMORE ESTATES MCR 002229
Public Remarks: This Stately gated compound is located on the prestigious Biltmore Estates Circle overlooking the Adobe golf course with incredible views of Camelback Mountain & the Phoenix Mountain Preserve. The Clive Christian kitchen offers Sub Zero & Wolf appliances, imported Italian marble, & butcher block island opening to a resort style backyard. The outdoor entertainers oasis is complete with an oversized patio, full outdoor kitchen, pool, fountain & gazebo. The property features 2 guest houses including 8 beds, 11 baths & custom elevator on over an acre lot. The primary suite overlooks views of Camelback Mountain & offers a stunning bathroom with dual vanities & an expansive walk-in closet. Experience living within walking distance to world class shopping, dining, and the Arizona Biltmore Resort.
Private Rmks - DND2: All information deemed reliable but shall be verified by buyer. Please schedule an appointment through Showing Time. 48 Hours Notice Required. SELLERS REQUEST AFTERNOON SHOWINGS.
Directions: North on 24th Street to AZ Biltmore Resort Entrance, East on Thunderbird Trail, South at Biltmore Circle to #37

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 139 GATEWAY AT SONORAN PRESERVE MCR 127441
Public Remarks: Welcome To Beautiful Desert Living! Impeccable 2019 Revere model invites you into a spacious two-story home with bright natural light, soaring ceilings., & whole house fan system!  4brm + den, 3.5bth, 3car garage. 42'' kitchen cabinets, ''smart'' appliances and granite countertops with ample breakfast bar seating. First floor office nook and separate den. Huge Primary Suite with mountain views, bathroom offering soaker tub and separate shower and ample-sized walk in closet. Large bonus room for workout , kids area, or to kick back and watch TV. Backyard includes salt-water pool w/solar cover, covered patio w/misters, sunshades and tasteful landscaping with RV gate. Solar Panels are OWNED. Perfect for entertaining! Community park area offers Splashpad and large Ramada for special gatherings

You have everything at your fingertips from restaurants to shopping, parks, mountains, and more.    Brand new 16-SEER HVAC installed in 2021, along with new interior paint, carpet, tile floors, backyard pavers and turf with a 24' long patio cover updated in 2020. The kitchen features quartz countertops and stainless steel appliances and a gorgeous dining room chandelier. Lots of storage throughout including garage cabinets, downstairs storage closet, upstairs hallway and walk in closets in each bedroom!    TENANT OCCUPIED - DO NOT DISTURB.

Public Remarks: WELCOME HOME! This beautiful, practically new 2 story, 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath is nestled in the pristine Laveen Gardens Community. Starting with the tall open entry way, gives room to take in friends and family. Kitchen is dressed with mocha colored cabinets and topped with custom granite counters. Under the sink we find a water filter. Of course we complimented it with full stainless steel appliances that includes a large GAS stove! Looking south out of the double wide sliding doors you have access to a large back yard with views for days. Upstairs we find 3 large rooms and a dedicated bathroom is joined with a game room. Finishing with the extra large masters with both shower and soaker tub. Double sinks of course. Water softener for the entire home! Check this one out!

This home is waiting for you, call now before it's gone!

Public Remarks: This home is a rare find in this market, new in 2016 single family home in a small community of 5 with a shared pool accessible through the back gate. Conveniently located minutes from the airport and some of the favorite local Arcadia/Biltmore dining and bar options. Short drive to some of the top high end shopping and dining in Phoenix. As you walk in through the front door you are welcomed by a spacious living room leading to the beautiful light and bright kitchen. Around the corner from the kitchen you'll find the dining room/secluded office space with plenty of natural light that floods in though the sliders that lead to the back yard. The upstairs offers high ceilings and a huge master bedroom with a large walk in closet and private balcony off the side.

Public Remarks: Custom home with large Workshop & Horse facilities on over Acre lot w/ Mountain Views.  This property features a 20'x30' workshop with a half bath, upgraded lighting & wiring non-slip epoxy floors, evap air, water, 240 volt outlets & concrete entrance slab w/ roll up door.  (Large custom bar included.)  Spacious horse property w/ 2'' oil piping all around.  4 horse stall barn w/ 64'x34' lighted breezeway. (Stalls measure 12'x16' each.)  2 12' gates, sand arena, quarter minus turnout w/electric & wtr to stalls and a 10x10 shed/hay barn.  Rock culvert w/ bridge & 11 new trees round out this amazing property.  Custom home features new A/C in 2021 and new roof in 2018.  Slate & engineered wood floors in entire house. Split floor plan w/ slate primary shower.  Kitchen w/ granite counters

Picturesque sunsets daily over the mountain views. Resort style backyard with plenty of room for entertaining and enjoying the amazing Phoenix weather.

Public Remarks: Welcome to an exquisite historic Bungalow built in 1940. Thoughtfully remodeled with a modern feel while keeping its original character features its original oak hardwood floors and exposed beams. The front portico is made with an old growth Douglass Fir reclaimed from demolished Phoenix area homes and milled in a wood shop a few blocks away. The original restored front door is hand carved. The kitchen features new custom cabinetry, a farmhouse sink with black mist honed granite countertops, cork pendants, reclaimed pecan hardwood floor, the shelves are Sapele, a tropical African hardwood with a natural Danish oil finish. The island features the scrap pine from the front portico to tie in the old with the new and stainless-steel appliances.

Directions: South on 7th Street, East on Fairmount, South on 9th Street to home on left!

Public Remarks: This beautiful two story home in the Community of Tramonto is a MUST-SEE! The welcoming interior features 18' ceilings, 2 grand stair cases, 2 family rooms, large den and full bath on bottom floor, game room upstairs with balcony, new carpet throughout and new paint (interior & exterior). Practice your cooking skills in this spotless eat-in kitchen equipped w/built-in appliances, granite countertops and gorgeous cabinets. This home has an over-sized, fully landscaped, backyard featuring a private pool with a hot tub and fire pit. Premium lot views, 3 car tandem garage and RV gate are just a few of the amazing features in this home. These original owners took pride in keeping this home very clean and maintained.

Public Remarks: Beautiful Desert Hills quality home with many upgrades!  Open flowing split floorplan. Solid alder doors & cabinets and travertine floors. Two sided propane fireplace. Kitchen boasts slab granite counters, stainless steel appliances (including double oven w/convection), an island that is great for entertaining & walk-in pantry. Beautiful view of back yard from sink. Primary bedroom/bath has dual closets, jacuzzi tub, snail shower and door to patio. Awesome oversized 3 car garage (32.33' x 24.85'). North facing backyard with mountain views. Includes expansive 10' x 85' covered patio, plus 10' x 100' patio slab extension, fire pit w/sitting area, putting green & RV parking w/hook-up. Lots of room for expansion, horses, equipment or whatever your heart desires. Outstanding Location and Value!

Public Remarks: Come and see this beautifully remodeled 3 bed, 2 bath home nestled in the community of Moon Valley Gardens. Mountain Views all around. Open and airy eat in kitchen with granite counter tops and stainless steel appliances. Generous sized bedrooms. Lovely updated bathrooms with tile showers and a jetted tub in the guest bath. Large backyard - perfect for the kids to play, host BBQs, enjoy the fire pit, or simply relax on the covered deck. Oversized garage and RV gates on both sides of the home for all your toys and storage needs. Top rated schools. Hiking, parks and golf courses nearby. Close to freeways. This home will not last long!
Directions: 19th Ave & Thunderbird, East on Thunderbird to 16th Ave, and South to the property.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautiful home in Cavalier Campus, within walking distance to the Biltmore area, local restaurants, coffee shops, and more! It's obvious from the moment you step inside that this home has been loved and cared for over the years. Enter into the open, welcoming living room with new(2021) wood-look tile flooring throughout, and walk back into your kitchen featuring upgraded 42'' upper cabinets, newer appliances, Corian countertops, and tile backsplash. Your owner suite includes newly renovated(2021) primary bathroom with tiled walk-in shower. The large den off the dining room is perfect for an office, second living space, play room or game room and has a large sliding glass door to the backyard. You'll find extra storage space & built-in shelves

Public Remarks: Fabulous 4 bedroom , 2.5-bathroom home located within the community of Villagio at Grovers. This home features an open floorplan, a sizable covered patio in the backyard and a spacious kitchen that boasts granite counters and backsplash, stainless steel appliances, and loads of cabinetry space. Public Remarks: Amazing home waiting for you here! Centrally located only minutes from the I-10, I-17, and 101. Just down the road from Grand Canyon University and close to great parks & schools, shopping, restaurants, and more. Nice floor plan with separate living and family rooms.  Low maintenance landscaping. Large backyard. Tile flooring throughout.. Good sized kitchen with breakfast bar and lots of cabinet storage space.  Ideal for a starter home if you're a first time buyer. It would make a great rental as well. Hurry and come take a look because it won't last long on the market! Thanks for stopping in for a look.

Public Remarks: Hillcrest is a private age restricted community - a lovely community  in the Moon Valley area. This is a three bedroom,  2 bath home on one of the larger lots in Hillcrest. Lots of beautiful trees & grass.  There is a small extra bonus room being used as an office off the Master Bedroom patio. This room is tile & has birch cabinets & its own heat & cool. Approximate size of bonus room is 10x6.5.  This home features a brick fireplace, wood floors except carpet in bedrooms. The saltillo tile patio wraps around the home ready for all those BBQ's & parties using the built-in brick gas grill.  Roof is 7 years new.  Welcome Home

Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautiful 3 bed, 2 bath home with POOL in the desirable Marbella! Situated on a cul-de-sac, offering a 2 car garage and easy-care landscape. Enter to find a large great room, designer paint, vaulted ceilings, sliding doors to the back, window treatments, and wood-look tile floors w/carpet in all the right places. Good-sized den is perfect for an office! The kitchen boasts a pantry, spacious counters, recessed lighting, and ample cabinetry w/crown molding. Main bedroom has a walk-in closet and an ensuite with a separate tub/shower & dual sinks. Fantastic backyard is an entertainer's delight! Relaxing covered patio, stacked stone built-in BBQ, and a Pebble-Tec pool w/water feature for year-round enjoyment complete this gem. NO neighbors behind for maximum privacy! Call NOW!

Public Remarks: Stunning home in North Phoenix!  This home sits on a huge, premier, corner lot, with 3 car garage, custom rod iron front gate, and paver front courtyard.  Inside you will find upgrades in every corner with a completely updated kitchen with white shaker cabinets, granite countertops, SS appliances include gas range, and huge walk-in pantry. Beautiful wood-look tile in the main living areas, fireplace, and wood shutters throughout.  Primary bedroom is split and has the walk-in closet of your dreams, en-suite bath with dual sinks, soaking claw-foot tub, and tiled shower.  Step outside to your ultra-private, resort-style backyard with sparkling pool, turf, and beautiful lush landscape. Steps away from scenic hiking paths, and close to dining, and shopping, don't miss this wonderful home!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 105 DYNAMITE MTN RANCH SECTION 31 PARCEL J VARIOUS LOT MCR 109425
Public Remarks: Located in the highly sought after Fireside at Norterra, this home is gorgeous. The front yard exterior fireplace is a perfect spot to handout with friends and family.  The interior of the home has wood flooring and oversized baseboards throughout. The kitchen is complemented by a large island, granite countertops, and a breakfast bar, perfect for family gatherings. The great room has fireplace, high ceilings, and a cozy vibe.  Owner's suite has plush carpet, ceiling fan and picture window, a full spa like bathroom with his and her vanities,  separate tub and shower and spacious walk in closet. The backyard features a sparkling pool + spa, a built in BBQ, and firepit. Gorgeous mountain views and a N/S exposure.  This home is a MUST SEE!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 9 COPPER LEAF DEVELOPMENT UNIT 1 MCR 067114
Public Remarks: You won't want to miss out on this amazing gem, in the highly desirable Copper Leaf Community in Phoenix! Well maintained, original owners. Upstairs has 4 large bedrooms, full bath, and den. With an additional bedroom and bathroom downstairs.  The Master bedroom boasts a large walk-in shower, separate oversized bathtub, double sinks, and a giant walk-in closet. The beautiful chef kitchen has a massive center island that has space cut out for 6 adults with a built-in sink and granite countertop, and an oversized pantry.  A 3-car garage is conveniently located behind the panty with direct access. The lovely backyard is perfect for large gatherings, parties, and other events, there are many mature fruit trees and bonsai trees. Low $88 monthly HOA includes 3 parks, 2 pools, and more!

This popular Borrego model features a 1st floor owners suite with unique spiral staircase providing direct access to the den/bonus room directly above. Other features include travertine flooring, upgraded gourmet kitchen with hi-end Thermador appliances and gas cook top, plus vaulted ceiling, and stone fireplace in family room. There's real grass in the backyard plus a built-in BBQ perfect for entertaining with family & friends. Minutes to K-8 school, Fry's Marketplace & I-17. Friendly community has year-round activities, pool, splash pad, parks, basketball, volleyball & tennis. Close to hiking & biking trails too. Welcome Home!

This highly sought after floor plan features an open den and the master suite on the bottom level. Upstairs you will find a loft and 3 additional bedrooms and guest bathrooms. The open concept chef's kitchen is beautiful with plenty of upgrades including quartz counters, staggered cabinets, soft close drawers, and crown molding. This home has over $50,000 in upgrades including extended recessed lighting, boot bench, upgraded stair railing, and so much more! Come see this beauty which sits on a desirable, larger corner lot with gorgeous white vinyl fencing, and awesome views of South Mountain.

Public Remarks: Fully remodeled modern home in Uptown Phoenix with an attached guest house. Renovated inside and out you can easily see the numerous updates including new flooring throughout, quartz countertops, 42 inch white real-wood cabinets, new stainless steel appliances, fantastic enclosed patio that looks out onto the beautifully landscaped backyard and even updated plumbing and electrical. The main home has three spacious bedrooms and two bathrooms and the attached guest house has its own kitchen and bathroom so it is perfect to use as a rental.  There is nothing you need to do to this beautiful home! This home is full of natural light, has North/South exposure and truly wows! And did I mention that there is NO HOA & it is close to major shopping, lots of restaurants & 51! This home will not last.

Public Remarks: Welcome to the Pierson House., located in the prized Biltmore/Camelback Corridor.   Completely rebuilt in 2006, this elegant property stays true to the character of the original ranch home and neighborhood, but, lives modern.  The functional floor plan is family friendly and also ideal for entertaining.   Upon entering you will be immediately treated to the stunning view of the lawn-scaped and private backyard as you overlook the large back patios.   The kitchen, remodeled in 2016, has soft white, modern cabinets and, granite counters.  It's backsplash shines with glass subway tile that complements stainless appliances, including a Wolf gas range, and custom lighting fixtures under cabinet lighting with hidden outlets.

Public Remarks: Desert Hills Homestead secluded yet close to Anthem off I-17.  Pride of ownership shines with traditional AZ home.  Enjoy beautiful mountain views from the private expansive back patio year round.  Cozy up to an outdoor fireplace or open fire pit. Cool off in the new pool or just sit near the serene fountain.  Ride your ATVs from the 3 car garage enjoying the beautiful Cave Creek Regional Park. NO HOA! With over 2.6 acres plenty of space for toys while enjoying privacy and a quiet lifestyle.  Home boasts open floor plan with vaulted ceilings and display shelving throughout main living space. Master suite includes luxury bath, separate shower, walk in closet dual vanity. 2021 New HVAC. FULL RV set up: 30 amp electrical connection, and sewer
Private Rmks - DND2: No showings, no exceptions till active on Monday after 4 pm, April 4th. Use ST for CBS code.  Docs tab for SPDS, Septic, Well documents.

Public Remarks: Iconic Arizona Biltmore Circle & the Golf Course's 18th Fairway provide the dramatic backdrop for renowned architect Bing Hu's Frank Lloyd Wright-inspired, organic architecture-styled ''Oasis in the Desert.'' Elegant intimacy combines with function, inviting any of today's lifestyle needs.  Soaring ceiling heights, over-sized windows & custom lighting frame your collections; with day to night transition pure magic. The restaurant style chef's kitchen exceeds any aspiring chef's desires. The private master retreat rivals any resort, offering his and hers spa baths; steam shower, sauna, exercise studio & refreshment-equipped relaxation - open to the private balcony with stunning lush grounds, Golf Course & Camelback Mountain views.

Public Remarks: WOW! Single-story Custom Home on third-acre Lot. FULLY UPDATED in 2022. Checks all the boxes! All major components replaced or renovated w/ warranties. NEW: Dual HVAC units w/ Nest T-stats; H2O heater; Low E windows (soundproof glass in master); pool equipment; flooring; tall baseboards; linear LED lighting; complete kitchen/baths w/ custom tile work, quartz & quartzite tops, Navy Shaker cabinets, SS appliances incl. Bosch D/W. Master Bath: LED mirrors; private commode w/ bidet; tub AND shower; walk-in closet. Soaring 12' & 9' ceilings.  Split floorplan. Latest Designer Finishes! Two-way Fireplace. Plantation shutters. Hunter fans. Wine Cabinet. Huge 3-car epoxied garage, 3500' paver drive. Yard sprinklers. Rooftop deck w/ Breathtaking Views of Piestewa Peak & City lights. Don't miss it!
Directions: From Glendale Ave, N on 20th St to Aurelius, W to Home. Walk to Piestewa Peak hiking trails, Madison School, churches/synagogue, shopping. Convenient to Biltmore, Scottsdale, PV, Downtown & Airport.

Public Remarks: Perfectly located in the desirable Willow Run neighborhood and shows like a model. Lower level has open & spacious floor plan that features Living room, eat-in kitchen, powder room. Upgraded kitchen cabinets, stainless-steal appliances with new side by side refrigerator. Upper level offers spacious Master Suite with lots of closet storage & the Master Bath with dual sink vanity. Two additional guest bedrooms shared Jack & Jill bath. Also, upstairs is a small loft, perfect for desk system & computer, or fitness machine. Courtyard area has custom pavers. Rear entry 2 car garage. New HVAC system! Washer/Dryer are also included! Next to the beautiful neighborhood park with playground, Minutes to Desert Ridge shopping & restaurants, PV Community College & golf course, Costco,51 & 101 freeway

Public Remarks: Amazing mountain views surround you on this one of a kind lot! This beauty features a fabulous entertaining backyard including heated pool with a waterfall spill over feature and spa, turf, covered patio, outdoor fireplace conversation area, RV Gate. Inside Gourmet kitchen with upgraded cabinets, large granite island opens to the family  room and eat-in kitchen. Large walk-in pantry and butler's pantry (coffee/wine bar). Refined touches including upgraded polished travertine floors, 3 fireplaces,  vaulted ceilings. Gorgeous staircase leads to a giant loft/living area and 3 additional bedrooms. Huge master suite with a sitting area, access to balcony with stunning views of Mount Preserve, beautiful bathroom w/opposing sinks and 2 walk  in closets. Access to West Valley via new 202 Freeway

Public Remarks: This one is a wow! It's remodeled and upgraded in all the best ways. Two master bedrooms with walk in closets, and spacious bathrooms redone in a contemporary spa vibe. Additionally, a separate office and a third bedroom round out the perfect amount of private spaces. The open kitchen has an oversized island, white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops galore, gas stove and stainless appliances. The large dining and living areas open to the backyard making this the perfect entertaining space. Swimming pool has new pump and filter. One of the two AC's is brand new as is the electrical panel. The wood plank style tile flooring and neutral color palette make this beauty move in ready for even the most meticulous buyer.

Public Remarks: Where to begin! Sitting on your front patio you will enjoy the unobstructed mountain & park views. Entering, you will find the remodeled open concept designed for entertaining. Amazing kitchen w/top of the line appliances, water filler at stove, circa 1800 barn wood custom island, farm sink, shaker cabinets, walk in pantry & French doors to a newly painted deck w/solar lighting. Lush backyard, 2 patios, mature trees & raised garden. Stunning Acacia hand-scraped wood floors throughout, dual pane windows, cozy fireplace, all 3 bathrooms fully remodeled, California closet in the master and amazing views from the two front bedrooms! New roof & 2 new HVAC in 2021. And then the heated/cooled garage! Fully insulated, epoxy floors, custom cabinetry, new smart garage door & new water heater.

Public Remarks: Awesome Ahwatukee retirement area, this spacious home boasts two large bedrooms.  Master bedroom has a sliding  door out to your covered patio.  Large bedroom closet and enclosed separate bath/shower area. Second bedroom has a large walk-in closet and tile flooring. Public Remarks: Fantastic opportunity to buy in highly desirable Lower Arcadia.  This home was completely remodeled 2010.  Split master floor plan with oversized master ensuite.  Vaulted ceilings, backyard access, large master bath.  Double vanities, oversized shower with dual shower heads.  Large bathtub and walk-in closet.  Extended length two-car garage and inside laundry room.  Main living space with kitchen open to living and dining room.  Kitchen hosts butcher block island, breakfast nook, concrete countertops and stainless appliances.  Three good sized secondary bedrooms, one with 3/4 bath.  Tons of storage has been added, Private yard with covered patio.  Wonderful schools, close to Sky Harbor, Highways and all of the restaurants, shops and hiking that Arcadia has to offer.   Don't miss this one!

Open house, April 2nd and possibly 3rd.  Offers will be reviewed on Sunday April 3rd however Seller reserves the right to accept offer prior to the 3rd.  Updated photos will be added after April 1.  Any questions, call Margo Ingram at 480-282-3284.
Directions: North on 52nd Street, second left is Pinchot. West on Pinchot, home is on south side of the street.

Public Remarks: Stunning home in the heart of uptown Phoenix. Fully updated in 2014, (including roof) this gorgeous property features an open concept great room with a split floor plan. The gourmet kitchen includes marble countertops, large island with prep sink, stainless steel farmhouse sink, all stainless appliances including a Bertazzoni 5 burner gas range, wall oven and microwave. Bathrooms have tile surround showers and marble countertops. Tile throughout except in bedrooms. Beautiful touches include crown molding, low E- Dual paned windows, travertine tile surrounds pool built in 2018 that has a heater and a cooling system to keep those hot summer days bearable.  All set on a 17,000+ sq/ft corner grassy lot with mature landscaping and 13 fruit trees...  2 car detached garage and large storage shed

Public Remarks: Charming classic red brick home on large cul de sac lot. Recent upgrades include Martha Stewart kitchen cabinets, wood-look tile flooring, interior doors, Baldwin door hardware, Delta Dryden plumbing fixtures. Public Remarks: This stunningly updated 4 bedroom 3 full bath and 2 powder room Black Rock Canyon property awaits the most discerning buyers. The heart of a home is its kitchen and this one is a showstopper! Custom Stone Creek cabinets were used to transform this kitchen into a showpiece. The finest finishes like Cambria Quartz were used and the centerpiece is a 48 inch 6 burner, Double Oven Wolf with a grill. It's perfectly appointed with soft close drawers, Sub Zero Fridge, wine/beverage fridge, built in microwave, large walk-in pantry and double islands. The updates and remodeling don't stop there! There is new hardwoods, baseboards and fresh interior paint. All bathrooms have been remodeled and updated. You'll find all new carpet, light fixtures, door hardware and hardwood doors installed throughout.

Public Remarks: Welcome Home to this Beautiful Phoenix oasis in Royal Palm Estates! 5 bedroom, 3.5 bath with 2 dens, climate controlled wine room and wet bar. Tons of storage throughout. Huge kitchen with GE Monogram side by side refrigerator and Viking 6 burner gas cooktop with grill, griddle, and professional Copper Hood. Knotty Alder custom cabinets throughout home. Hardwood interior doors, high end custom windows and sliding glass doors. Split private ensuite near front door. Split Master suite has private patio with hot tub and wood burning fireplace. Separate tub and steam shower in Master bath with adjoining exercise room. Electrical hookup for RV inside gate. There is too much to list and too much discover in this one of a kind Desert Gem!

Public Remarks: Charming, original Ralph Haver home, with the characteristic floor to ceiling windows, sloped rooflines, block construction and many of the other classic features of a Haver designed mid-century modern home.  This gem is situated in the heart of the highly sought after Beverly Park subdivision of the Biltmore area of Central Phoenix.  While being only minutes from everything you need including the Biltmore Fashion Park and Camelback Colonnade, it feels like you are miles from the hustle and bustle in your own secluded part of Phoenix with irrigated front lawns and enormous tree-line streets.  This 4 bedroom, 3 bath property was meticulously remodeled by the owners in 2019...

Public Remarks: Charming front porch welcomes you home to this beautiful property.  Recent updates include the stunning kitchen, new carpet, paint and water softener.  Spacious floor plan features 5 bdrms, plus an enormous loft/bonus room.  The master bedroom is on the first floor providing privacy and great split bedroom functionality. Brazilian oak floors on the main level add warmth and character.  The home has N/S exposure with a pool to enjoy along with a grassy area for Fido.  Premium corner lot with mature landscaping.  Add a three car garage and an abundance of storage and this home ticks all the boxes.  Shows like a model and ready for your moving truck.  Conveniently located near Deem Hills Park, all the amazing shopping at Norterra.  Welcome home.

Public Remarks: Luxurious former model Home in the desirable Community of Anthem Arroyo Grande. Expensively updated with Marble and Granite tiles and Architectural elements throughout. Your backyard Oasis awaits you! Huge covered patio, refreshing pool with fountains, Ramada with plenty of room for a fire pit or outdoor dining. No neighbors behind, mountain views. Gorgeous gourmet kitchen features white Merilat cabinets, beautiful silestone white countertops, upgraded SS appliances, Butlers Pantry, Cozy breakfast area with upgraded lighting. Wonderful family room with gas fireplace and soaring ceilings, surround sound in several rooms. Grand Master retreat has slider to pool, huge walk-in closet, private spa-like master bathroom with marble flooring, tile tub, silestone countertops. And so much more!

Public Remarks: CUSTOM NEW BUILD!! ARCADIA LITE w/ views of Camelback!!  This unique 5 bedroom, 4 bath home with over 3000sf is a masterpiece in the heart of Arcadia Lite. The massive quartz island is the perfect centerpiece to a chef's kitchen with walk in pantry.  The open great room with soaring ceilings highlights the 60'' gas fireplace and custom quartz mantle. The second story balcony showcases its views of Camelback Mountain.  No detail was left behind on this one including the quartz and tile work in bathrooms, custom made bannisters, 2 laundry rooms, high-end appliances, etc.  Property is a short bike ride to OHSO, Lil O's, LGO, AJ's and a handful of coffee shops and retail centers.  PROFESSIONAL PHOTOS WILL BE UPLOADED LATE NEXT WEEK.

Public Remarks: THIS HOME IS INCREDIBLE!! Located in the highly desirable Eagle Bluff neighborhood. Featuring designer touches & finishes throughout, this light and bright home is just what you've been looking for. New wood-like plank tile flooring, granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, R/O system, Nest thermostats, garage floor coating, pantry cabinets, kitchen backsplash, and landscaping. Huge living room & family room open to a stunning open-concept kitchen with a large center kitchen island. 3 spacious bedrooms upstairs with a rare bonus/game room loft area that could easily be converted to an office or 4th bedroom. Outside features mountain views and backed up to an open space with tons of privacy. Zero maintenance yard with beautiful turf & pavers to compliment an oversized covered patio.

The main bedroom comes with an upscale bathroom equipped with new vanity & designer tile in the shower. Large backyard with room for a pool is a blank canvas waiting for new owner's personal touch. What more can you ask for? Hurry to see it before it disappears!

Public Remarks: Welcome to this gem in The Arbors, a highly sought after gated community. This upgraded smart home has many features that will thrill all who enter. The master suite has a spacious ensuite w/ a massive walk-in shower & 2 walk in closets. Of the three guest rooms, there is one that is an oversized guest suite w/ a full private bath. 12' foot ceilings and 8' doors throughout the home keep it nice & airy. The chef's kitchen boasts industrial quality Monogram series appliances, wine fridge & oversized refrigerator. The home is equipped w/ fiber optics, prewired for surround sound. Temp-controlled saltwater pool, front and garage door can all be operated from an app! The fenced pool w/ waterfall along with an extended patio make for perfect entertainment year-round. Schedule a Showing TODAY

Public Remarks: Gorgeous Monterey Model in the Prestigious Anthem Country Club. Recently painted inside & out,  4 bedroom 3.5 bath.Owners suite has his and hers vanities,walk in shower and separate tub, plus spacious walk in closet. Two bedrooms share a jack and jill bathroom, and the 3rd has a full ensuite. Plantation shutters through out, GE S.S. appliances,beautiful stacked stone in the kitchen & family room  plus 12' ceilings.Enter the back yard to the sparking new pebble tec pool with cool deck and 500.000 BTU heater for swimming early and late into the season. Enjoy the beautiful flagstone patio , w/ built in BBQ island ,gas fire pit & above ground  spa  to enjoy the mountain views. 3 car garage with 4 ft extension & epoxy painted floors + storage cabinets.Water softener & reverse osmosis.
Private Rmks - DND2: washer and dryer do not convey. Wine cooler and frige in garage ,do not convey. Outdoor solar lights and heaters  in pool area do not convey. Home warranty paid through November. AC serviced every year since owned

Public Remarks: Nestled in one of the best neighborhoods in North Central & adjacent to Royal Palm Park, this Calvis Wyatt home offers so much! Terrific floor plan w/ 4 bedrooms, 3 baths, family room & formal living & dining room. Bedrooms are split & the 4th bedroom makes a great office. Kitchen layout works great, has a breakfast area plus a gas fireplace. The owner's suite is spacious w/ a huge closet & great views to the backyard garden. The backyard, it is incredible ? lush landscaping, built-in BBQ w/ island & beverage box, gas fireplace & fountains. The 13,782 sq. ft. lot seems even bigger with wide open views to Royal Palm Park. A true three car garage with storage & a service door out to the back. Last but not least, the curb appeal on this home is amazing w/ stone accents & lush landscaping

Public Remarks: Upgraded corner lot 3 bed, 2 bath property located in Paradise Valley Oasis community. All windows are newer dual pane, French door to backyard, surround sound throughout property with Alexa enabled technology. Home features gravel landscaping, 2 car garage, plus RV gate wired for 30 AMP. The recently updated interior boast neutral paint, open floor plan with living & dining areas, and tile flooring throughout. The gorgeous kitchen is equipped with LG stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry, solid surface quartz counters, island with breakfast bar, and elegant pendant lighting. Inside the master suite you will find an immaculate bath & closet. Indoor laundry with sink and butler pantry.

Public Remarks: Welcome to this charming 2-story, 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home with tile throughout the main floor.  Enjoy the open kitchen, pull up a barstool to the kitchen island and enjoy the eat in kitchen area.  Wander into the great room with a lovely dining area.  The separate living room finishes the first floor with lots of room for gatherings.  Upstairs you will find the laundry room conveniently located.  The spacious primary bedroom has overhead light and ceiling fan, a walk in closet,  and primary bath complete is with private water closet.  Three guest bedrooms  have overhead lights, ceiling  fans and walk in closets.   Not far from the community pool and park, this also close to shopping, schools and Westgate! Public Remarks: Welcome to this beautifully maintained home in N. Phoenix.  Surrounded by a community that includes parks and walking paths, and within walking distance of natural desert open space for hiking, this house is perfectly situated to enjoy the outdoors.  Home owner has made several significant upgrades to make this home special and more enjoyable. Including on demand hot water, newer dishwasher, newer Kool deck and more. In close proximity to the 101 freeway, offering you easy access to Desert Ridge Shopping Center, or I-17 for an escape to north country. Or just relax in your spacious back yard and enjoy the sparkling pool.

Sliding glass doors lead to the back patio, perfect for a BBQ! Head upstairs to find the bedrooms. The Master suite features a walk-in closet, dual vanities, a step-in shower, and a private toilet room. Northgate is a gated community that features walking paths, parks, B-Ball courts, and a community pool!

Public Remarks: Freshly painted and squeaky clean with remodeled Bathrooms, new dual pane windows throughout, and a huge backyard.  Come see this cute blue doll house that has been very well cared for over the years.  2 spacious bedrooms with ample storage.  Additional storage over the carport for long term or seasonal items, and an attached storage shed at the end of the carport.  Inside laundry.  Spacious Kitchen with stainless appliances, ample counter space and cabinets, with views of the backyard and extended patio.  Evap was removed, and HVAC was installed new in 2011 and includes gas heat for extra savings.  Gas water heater as well.  Grass is present in backyard, and can easily be fully restored by Buyer for a lush landscape to enjoy.  RV Gate with side yard space to store your toys!  No HOA

Public Remarks: Super clean & move-in ready, this gorgeous 4 bed/3.5 bath Toll Brothers home with pool sits on a premium view lot in the highly sought-after N. Phoenix gated community of Sonoran Foothills. Popular Borrego model features a 1st floor owners' suite w/upgraded bathroom including free-standing tub, vaulted ceiling in the family room w/gas fireplace and gourmet kitchen has a gas cook top. 2nd floor features a convenient tech niche, bonus/flex room and a large bedroom w/private bath. You'll love entertaining in the large north facing backyard w/3 citrus trees and no houses directly behind. Minutes to K-8 school, Fry's Marketplace & I-17. Friendly community has year-round activities, pool, splash pad, parks, basketball, volleyball & tennis. Close to hiking & biking trails too. Welcome Home!

Public Remarks: This three-bedroom, two-bath, 1,800SF home on an oversized 9,500SF lot is ready for new owners! NO-HOA, Paradise Valley Schools, very desirable Road Runner Estates Neighborhood. This home features both a great room and a sunken living room. The kitchen has granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, including a Sub-Zero refrigerator with plenty of space from two walk-in pantries. The primary bedroom has a large walk-in dual head shower, a separate exit to the backyard, and plenty of closet space.  Let's not forget about all the entertainment:  Indoor wood-burning fireplace, recently upgraded pool, separate man-shed, orange tree, and don't forget about the chicken coupe.  EZ Access to freeways, PV Shopping & Dining, Desert Ridge, High Street, Kierland, Scottsdale Quarter, Mayo, MIM....

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 1873 POINTE SOUTH MOUNTAIN UNIT 8 MCR 032409
Public Remarks: Opportunity Knocks on this wonderful Pointe South Mountain home. Ideally located near the Arizona Grand Resport & Spa and Arizona Grand Golf Course, the residence backs to a premium golf course lot and features: 4 generous sized bedrooms, 3 bathrooms plus a 3-car garage. The vaulted ceilings, cozy fireplace and natural travertine floors throughout give the home a great feel. The kitchen and family room are ideal for entertaining and the upstarirs loft perfect for an office/flex space. Completing the picture is the private, tree-lined backyard area backing to the golf course. Walking distance to South Mountain Park, a short hop to the I-10 Freeway and just 20 mins to Sky Harbor International Airport. This one will go quickly!

Legal Description (Abbrev): LOT 5 ESTATES AT THE RANCH MCR 044140
Public Remarks: COMING SOON!  Beautiful Spanish-style home in gated Estates at the Ranch close to Ahwatukee in Phoenix and part of Mountain Park Ranch Community. 3BD & 2BA home, approx 1736SF on approx 6'075SF lot with desert landscaping. Spacious chef's kitchen with granite counters, SS appliances, and all-tile floors. Private Pebble Tec pool. Mountain Park Ranch Community features three large recreational areas with amenities including a heated pool, spa, children's pool, playground, large grassy areas, tennis courts, picket ball courts, 1/2 basketball court, volleyball, cooking and picnic areas.  Currently, tenant-occupied.  Appointments available during week with open houses to 4/1 from 4-7pm, 4/2 from1 10-1, 4-3 from 1-4 .  All showings will be accompanied by listing brokerage.
Private Rmks - DND2: Use ShowingTime to schedule appointments.      All showings accompanied by Vylla Agent.  Open: 04/01/2022.  Fri 4pm-7pm, Sat 10am-1pm, Sun 1-4pm.    Tenant Occupied thru 05/02/2022, COE 05/05/2022.  Offers due 4/4/22 @ 12pm.  Offers will be reviewed by Seller 4/4/22.   Responses to agents on 4/5/22.  Please allow time for review.

Public Remarks: Completely renovated 4Bed/3Bath in Sherwood Town Community-central Phoenix, immediately near Arcadia, Biltmore, and shopping/entertainment in the heart of Scottsdale. Est completion 3/31. Will boast an open floor plan aprx 2650ft with addition of master bedroom suite & 2 car garage. Modern design masterfully planned by a licensed interior designer. Architectural design/engineering by ''Morris Originals'' in Seattle WA - previously featured on HGTV. Upgrades includes complete new plumbing & main service lines, new electrical rewire with new breaker, new drywall & insulation, new AC & AC mechanical, new roof, new windows & doors, upgraded new appliances & finishes, tankless water heater, large kitchen island, lrg walk-in pantry, lrg master walk-in closet/shower & luxurious soaking bath tub.

Public Remarks: Biltmore Highlands Classic Hallcraft Terrace model on the Western Slope of Piestewa Peak and the Phoenix Mountain Preserve. Nestled in with more expensive homes, it has been loved and cared for by long time owners. This hillside hideaway is located above street level and enjoys early summer afternoon shade provided by the surrounding canyon. Out back enjoy a quiet patio with a lush and cool  landscape featuring a truly super sized Secret Garden. Piestewa Peak is fast becoming an option to Arcadia for busy professionals wanting easy access to the entire Valley. The Phoenix Mountain Preserve and Madison Schools fuel the popularity. Remodeled homes starting at 2000 ft. are going for $1.0 and up. Walk   to several Preserve Trailheads. Restaurants Districts & Shopping close by. See documents!

Public Remarks: Welcome to Marion Estates!  You must see this gorgeous home. As you drive down the street you are greeted by the stunning views of Praying Monk and Camelback mountains.  This wonderful home features a  newer roof, recessed lighting throughout. Modern ceiling fans throughout the home! Beautiful stainless steel appliances in the kitchen. GE Profile oven and refrigerator. LG dishwasher.  Granite countertops in kitchen and bathrooms. Built in pantry. Gorgeous Toffee Maple kitchen cabinets. 5 1/2 base board molding throughout. Soothing paint hue throughout. Dual shower heads in Master bath. Upgraded doors and dual pane windows throughout. RV Gate. Separate office/artist studio or can be a guest house in backyard. Blown Cellulose in the attic. Very energy efficient.

Public Remarks: Come and see this charming 3 bed, 2 bath home in a great Phoenix location! A grassy front yard w/shade trees, an extended driveway for parking space, and a cozy front patio greet you upon arrival. Discover a large formal living/dining room, designer paint, window treatments, and wood flooring w/tile in wet areas. Enter the kitchen to find stainless steel appliances, quartz counters w/backsplash, and plenty of cabinets. Main bedroom has barn doors entry, access to the back, a walk-in closet, and a private full bathroom. Check out the spacious backyard offering a separate workshop w/attached storage shed, a relaxing covered patio, space for enjoying BBQ, a lovely deck, and an above-ground fiberglass pool for year-round enjoyment! Close to schools, shopping, dining, and freeways.

Public Remarks: Semi Custom Luxury at its finest! Diller Grove at The Park is an idyllic parkside living neighborhood in the heart of North Central Phoenix. 11 semi-custom, designer-curated luxury residences create a tree-lined pocket within the Royal Palm neighborhood. Crafted with connectivity in mind and designer finishes; unique 2 bedroom basement, new pool and professional landscaping. This 4,345 SF features 5 bedrooms, 3 upstairs (w/ on suite bathrooms) and 2 bedrooms downstairs. 3 Car Tandem Garage with tons of space.  Backyard will feature a HEATED pool w/ SPA and newly installed hardscaping and trees (see rendering in docs tab)!  Energy efficient, comfortable, and beautifully crafted! This is a must see!

Public Remarks: Great remodeled 4 bedroom 2 bath home in Arcadia located within the Hopi School Boundaries! This property would be perfect for an end user, investor, office, rental, or an AirBnb. You walk into the living room w/ beautiful wood flooring, open to the kitchen with quartz counter-tops & stainless steel appliances.  This modern remodeled home has a split floorplan w/ large primary bathroom w/ oversized shower. The formal dining room opens up to an incredible backyard, with a covered patio, gas fire-pit , large gazebo & a view of Camelback Mountain, along with an auto-gate in rear.  It's just a bike ride away from O.H.S.O., LGO, & all the other Arcadia hot spots! This is a must see! Home next door to the south is also available for sale &  could potentially be converted to commercial.

Public Remarks: This truly modern home nestled into the Ahwatukee foothills is purpose built for entertaining and family life. It takes full advantage of its unique site, capturing views to the Sonoran desert from nearly every room. The home was designed and built for these original owners by the PATRY Building Company and under the supervision of architect Hayes McNeil.   The main entrance leads you to an open custom steel stair that brings you up to all of the homes living & public spaces. This minimalist design also includes 4 bedroom & 4 bathrooms, a gourmet kitchen featuring Carrara marble waterfall island & countertops, elegant cabinetry & sub zero and gaggenau appliances. interior living spaces open to a multi-use backyard complete with outdoor dining areas, a unique and private pool, water feature

Public Remarks: **TO BE BUILT HOME** Great location to build your future home! This Stylish Home features an open floorplan concept with a  large Great Room that adjoins the Kitchen making it perfect for Entertaining. The Gourmet Kitchen is a Chef's Dream offering Stainless Steel Appliances with a Built-In Refrigerator, a Generous Kitchen Island, White Shaker Style Cabinets with Soft Close Drawers and Doors, Quartz Counter Tops, and Wood-like Tile in all the main areas.  Step out onto your patio and enjoy the stunning Mountain Views along with the AZ Sunrise and Sunsets to the East and West! Close to Shopping and Entertainment with Excelling Schools in the area, both Private and Public. Customize this home to make it your own!

Public Remarks: ***Pride of ownership*** Light and airy floorplan with tons of windows lets in loads of light. This well-kept and updated home is the classic 3 bedroom, 2 bath in North Phoenix. Refreshed kitchen with gas stove, stainless steel appliances, updated backsplash, gleaming  island with breakfast bar. Spacious Primary suite offers a bonus sitting room. Primary bath has generous-size shower. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are very sizeable. Right sized living room has plenty of room for guests. Stylish tile through main walking area. Entertainers patio in the backyard with shed and cinder block walls all around.  Don't miss this one!

Public Remarks: Investor's only- Immediate ROI opportunity. Beautiful Licensed Care Facility with previous AIRBNB and VRBO history.  5 BD/3 BA- 10 bed facility. Ahwatukee home that has been recently updated with extreme care, perfect for a care facility. New Roof, new flooring, updated fixtures, added fire sprinklers, and No HOA. Extra large lot, fenced play pool/spa, fruit trees, extensive covered patio.  Home has vaulted ceilings. Kitchen has been beautifully updated with commercial grade appliances, new cabinetry, and has granite countertops. A few steps down from the main level, you will find an enormous bonus room/facility office, with a wet bar & separate entrance for employees. That level also has 2 bedrooms & a full bath updated with marble countertops.

Public Remarks: Entertainers dream! Spectacular Semi-Custom Great Room home with 4-car garage, pre-paid solar lease, resort backyard & a swimming pool-spa located in the Boulder Mountain hillside gated 23 home community of Morningside Park. Average monthly power bill is $18 including keeping the pool heated year round! This home was designed for entertaining! Spacious oversized granite island kitchen with stainless gas cooktop & wall ovens. Large electric fireplace great room with coffered ceilings. Spacious owner's suite with luxury master bath including a snail shower, jetted tub & large walk-in closet. Two guest bedrooms share a jack & jill bath. This home has a functional floor plan with so much potential- extended family care, income producing rental, etc. Downstairs you will find a large bedroom and full bath. Remodeled kitchen with beautiful glass tile, stainless appliances and quartz counters opens to the spacious family room with fireplace. Large formal living and dining rooms with vaulted ceilings. Upstairs you will find a huge loft with storage, and mountain views. 2 secondary bedrooms and updated guest bath on one side of the loft. On the other you will find a huge primary bedroom with sitting area (or office, or exercise room) and access to a deck with incredible city and mountain views. Primary bath has huge walk in shower, dual vanities, spacious

Public Remarks: 72 Hour Sale! Rare opportunity in Moon Valley. This gorgeous home sits on a large lot with mountain views. Double doors greet you to an open concept living area, dining room, Kitchen with granite countertops and new appliances Family room includes its own wet bar and sunken Fireplace/lounge area. Master suite features large walk in closet with custom built-ins, jet tub, double sinks and walk in shower. Guest quarters include Full Bathroom with one sink, and two very spacious rooms. The backyard is perfect for entertaining with an extended covered patio, built in BBQ, pebble tec pool, RV gate, and ample storage with a 2.5 car garage with custom built ins and shed on the side making plenty of room for storage and toys. Home is complete with a water softener and dual pane windows. Must See!

This parcel backs up to the canal, so nobody will ever build behind you, keeping your views free and clear!

Public Remarks: Absolutely stunning home with tons of on-trend features located in the sought after Village at Aviano community. The chef's eat-in kitchen incorporates refaced cabinets, quartz counters, tile backsplash, huge center island with breakfast bar, top-of-the-line stainless appliances, gas cooktop with hood, trash compactor, and a RO system. Other features include fresh paint throughout, 24in tile floor entry, Ring doorbell, Cox security cameras, new LVT flooring, upgraded fans and fixtures, built-in surround sound, spacious office den with LEDs, huge open loft with built-ins, gas family room fireplace with floor to ceiling stonework, upgraded laundry room, and a 3.5 epoxy garage with new openers and double tank water softener. The downstairs master suite has private backyard exit, Hunter

Public Remarks: WOW!   A no-expense spared renovation.   A Backyard Oasis.  And, a relaxing view of Piestawa Peak!    This home boasts a great room which opens to the dining room and beautiful kitchen with high-end appliances.   The kitchen overlooks the back yard and the view of Piestawa Peak.  As you go from room to room, everything is fully renovated and lovingly cared for.  Once you get to the Master bedroom,  there is more of the same and, once again, you are greeted with an immaculate space that opens to the backyard and THAT VIEW!   This home and Oasis will not last long...    Maintenance items: Windows replaced in 2019.   Water Heater replaced in 2020.  Roof Replaced in 2011.  AC is on a twice- yearly service schedule  Renovation completed in 2020.

Public Remarks: Single story home with a NEW ROOF and NO HOA! Easy to maintain desert landscaping, North/South exposure, 2 car garage, extended covered patio, fire pit and jacuzzi in the back! The home has an open concept floorplan, the kitchen features upgraded cabinets, granite counter tops & backsplash and upgraded appliances. The home also features an upgraded guest bathroom, updated ceiling fans throughout, the master bedroom has an en-suite bathroom that includes double sinks, a walk-in shower/tub combo and so much more! Conveniently centrally located and is just a few minutes or less to the Loop-101 and I-17 freeways, Deer Valley Unified School District, tons of restaurants and entertainment and more!

Public Remarks: If you dream of that idyllic place in a time of pool parties, backyard barbecues, croquet, and bocce ball, dream no more...welcome to Why Worry Lane. Tucked back in a tree-lined cul-de-sac on a one-acre lot, this expansive 7-bedroom 7 bath home is perfect for large gatherings or intimate events.  The main house features 4 bedrooms downstairs, including a ground level primary suite and connected den/office, and 3 bedrooms upstairs. The gourmet kitchen is thoughtfully planned and is the heart of the home, flowing seamlessly with the other areas of the house.  The backyard is a sanctuary within the city with an abundance of grass, covered porches and patios, an oversize pool/spa, gas firepit, a pool house, sports court, batting cage, and gym. The pool house and gym both have private baths.
Private Rmks - DND2: No showings until the property is active status in the MLS.  Note, the home is connected to flood irrigation. Buyer to verify all facts figures and measurements.

Legal Description (Abbrev): SILVA TERRACE LOT 9 E2 & LOT 10 E2
Public Remarks: This inviting home has pride of ownership evident in all details, from the interior updates to the manicured outdoor areas. 4.5'' white plantation shutters adorn new windows letting in natural light and showcasing the dark wood floor throughout the home.  Updated bathrooms and new closet systems in the bedrooms add extra storage along with the two walk-in closets. Epoxy flooring, garage cabinets, a water softener system, new 16 SEER HVAC unit, and hybrid water heater are exceptional extra touches. A 40' x 20' RV pad and 12' gate.  Patio fencing surrounds the newly installed artificial turf in the midst of a large ficus tree and custom planters. A short distance from the hiking trails of Piestewa Peak or Granada Park with fishing, walking, biking paths, and playground areas. Welcome home!

Public Remarks: Stunning Mountain Vistas and Unobstructed Valley Views - Located in a quiet community, close to the Piestewa Peak Trailhead, discover a Phoenix Mid-Century Classic. Well positioned on a 10,000+ level lot with North/South exposure, the well maintained, 3 bedroom/2 bath home has been recently updated and offers an abundance of open, single level living space. The meticulously maintained private backyard is your personal retreat surrounded by the spectacular Sonoran terrain. Complete with covered patio, pergola, citrus trees, and sparkling pool, it offers precisely what makes our Phoenix lifestyle so desirable. Situated in the prestigious Biltmore area, you can easily access excellent restaurants, luxury shopping, and Freeway while still enjoying the serenity of the unique mountain preserve.

Public Remarks: Professional photos to come...Experience the North Central dream in this ranch style home on one of the most incredible lots you'll find! Situated on an 11,600sf corner lot, the main home is 3 beds + den with a separate 350sf guest house (not included in square footage) and a huge pool! Home has been updated over the years to create an open flow with the remodeled kitchen opening into the living room and dual sliding glass doors opening to the backyard to create an indoor/outdoor living experience. The idyllic backyard is perfect for enjoying the outdoors year-round with a pool, built-in gas BBQ & fire pit, gazebo, mature trees and grass area to play. Detached guest house can be used as a bedroom, bar, game room or even converted to an Airbnb space. RV/boat/trailer parking available..
